name: Susie Hooks
text: Joe Rider was my technician. He couldn’t have been nicer or more respectful. He told me what he found. Gave me options on what I should do. Never tried to strong arm me into buying anything that at this time I was not ready to do. I strongly suspect that I will use stegall when it is time to buy new. Thank you Stegall, for having a person like Mr. Rider. I am very pleased

name: Lisa Wever
text: Our AC decided to go out on a weekend of Heat Advisories and warnings. Stegall sent out Joe, the technician, about 4 hours after we called - amazing since it was a Sunday! Joe was great - kind, gracious, and took care of things quickly and with care. He knew exactly what he was doing. Thanks to Joe, we are now cooled down 12 hours later! And - the price was reasonable! Thank you!

name: Gaby Zimmerman
text: We are very pleased with the service from this company. John was the first technician hat didn't try to sell us a new unit. Extremely knowledgeable and took a lot of time to explain everything to us. Highly recommended, don't waste your time or money on anybody else !!

name: Angela Turner
text: Stegall always responds quickly! Called at 5pm on a Friday because AC was not cooling. Joe was there within the hour! He did a great job and there was cool air by sundown!

name: RACHEL CRUZ
text:
Joe did a wonderful job in addressing our issues. His positive attitude helped lessen the blow of the cost.

They responded quickly too!

name: Gary Anderson
text: Great service. I has a few issues with a unit they installed at my home. They have always been prompt and professional in responding. Ken did a great job replacing some major components. Excellent service

name: Alex Thrasher
text: I've used Stegall for a number of plumbing and electrical projects over the past month.  Projects include, installing light fixtures and fans, installing new faucets, and troubleshooting and fixing drainage issues and power issues.  Jerry, Shelly, Brandon, and the other employees who have worked at the house have all been fantastic.  They have been responsive to my requests, flexible with scheduling or other issues, and their prices have been better than competitor quotes one each project they've done for me.    I've been very pleased with my experience with Stegall and plan to use them moving forward for other major projects.

name: Retired 4 years
text: Traffic bad, got home late, cooking dinner and realize man it's hot in here, called Stegall Joe Rider was our tech. He is my hero. I am now cooling off. He came in asked a few questions and said what he thought was wrong and he was correct. I highly recommend Stegall and ask for Joe.

name: Carey Crowder
text: Today Joe Rider came and worked on our air conditioner. He was very professional and had a wonderful personality. Mr Rider shook my hand and demonstrated great patience when explaining my new thermostat. It was a pleasure to do business with an individual like Joe. Thank you for hiring someone of this caliber and look forward to future business with Stegall.

name: Trevor Hightower
text: John did a great job with my AC unit repair. He notified me of all my options and worked quickly to make sure the job was done right.

name: Carl Emmons
text: John came out and arrived exactly when they estimated he would. He diagnosed my issue, found a solution better than what I had “googled”, and had my problem fixed within 50 minutes. This was my first time using Stegall, but I’ll definitely call them moving forward.

name: Mary Terry
text: I recently had a water heater installed.The contractor,Brandon Jones arrived at his appointed time.He was  courteous and professional.He and two others had my heater in a a short amount of time.I. highly recommend Stegall to anyone needing electrical or plumbing services.Their office managers Brenda and Shelley are also very kind and caring.

name: michael thomas
text: Installed a new unit. Service was excellent. Johnathan, Justin, and Joe were great. Shelley provides above and beyond customer service. Highly recommend this company.

name: bettie vernon
text: I had a new unit installed around two weeks ago.  It is so quiet that I put my hand over the vent to make sure it was working and it was.  The young men that were here were so polite and courteous.  Thank you Stegall.

resp.text: Than you so much for the opportunity please let us  know if you have any questions.

name: Adam Senn
text: I recently called Stegall to check out my sluggish A/C unit and they were very responsive and both Shelly and Joe were courteous and professional. They quickly had my units serviced and ready for summer and I highly recommend them!

name: Ss Cc
text: Stegall did a great job as usual and Joe was very helpful in explaining my system. I will be using Stegall in the future for my service and maintenance needs!

name: Howard Garrison
text: Joe and Steven inspected and cleaned our AC units and heat pumps. They were very professional and courteous.

name: David Hall
text: We use Stegall for all our HVAC work and have been for the past 10 years.  They are the best at customer service.  Their technicians arrive when scheduled, are always polite and courteous, and our HVAC never goes out.  Joe Ryder, our technician this year, was great!  I highly recommend.

name: Harrison Bender
text: Joe Rider is great. He has been to my home for service on multiple occasions and is always incredibly polite and on time. Service is great with Stegall.

name: Jeff Owens
text: Love this company. I really appreciate Joe and all he did to fix our air conditioning. I am so happy with my experience with Stegall and highly recommend them!

name: David Coram
text: I had an after hours HVAC emergency at my home.  It was hot and the HVAC would not come on. It was around Midnight on a Friday night when I called Stegall. Joe Rider was on call and came right out in about 30 minutes, and got us up and running in about 20 minutes.  He was courteous, kind, and had a great attitude to be up so late.  I wish I could hire more people like Joe to work for me!!

name: Drew Lansdell
text: Stegall has been very professional in my experience with them. I have requested two homes receive an HVAC inspection prior to purchase, and Joe has performed both. I would highly recommend the service.

name: Cathy Gibson
text: Woke up July 3rd. No air. Twenty guests expected for a Fourth of July celebration!  Shelly was extremely helpful in the office and Joe the technician came out and had us up and running in no time. Thanks Stegall!!

name: Susan Smith
text: Very prompt and courteous service in the middle of the night to get our air conditioning working. We were so grateful!

name: Shane Gates
text: From the office staff to the guys on the field, everyone is fantastic! I've had work in plumbing, electrical, and HVAC. Brandon, Chuck, Justin, Nick, and Quentin are professional, personable and knowledgeable. Shelly who works in the office is priceless! This company has the best employees you could ask for! I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Excellent service! I appreciate the prompt response to my initial phone call. I can't remember the last time technicians have covered my floors with protective sheets. I have already recommended them to my co-workers!

name: G Weldon
text: Have used Stegall for HVAC units, electrical needs and plumbing issues and highly recommend them!  Just today I had a plumbing issue - was able to get a quick response time, and can’t express enough how awesome and thorough Brandon and Bobby were in resolving the problem and cleaning up afterwards.  And, the fees are so much more reasonable than what I’ve encountered in the past!

name: samuel mcdonald
text: We were very impressed with Joe's professionalism and integrity as he serviced our HVAC this morning. He did a wonderful job!

name: Tony Diliberto
text: Joe and Steven we on time and very profesh. Great company!

name: janet taylor
text: I just completely replaced my central heating/air system and duct work after many years long overdue, which was a task.  I shopped thoroughly and got 4 bids, Jeremiah's bid was best as well as the install was very satisfactory with experienced professional & courteous labor.  I greatly appreciated Jeremiah's drive and honesty to give the best job for the best price.  I also recommend Carrier Infinity unit with media filter and UV light.

name: BIZ 77
text: Had an issue with my drip pan being full and needed the drain unclogged so I contacted Stegall who sent Joe the same morning to get the issue resolved quickly.  Went ahead and signed up for the two visits a year deal because I was so impressed with the service we received.

name: Lisa Churchill
text: I called 4 different companies to help me with purchasing a new HVAC unit for my sunroom. No one could help with this purchase and install - all said that the crawl space was too small for a new unit. However, Stegall said, "Yes!" The team of Jo, Todd and Justin dismantled the existing unit piece by piece and fit the new unit in this tight space. It is anyways easier to say no but so glad that Stegall said YES! It works like a charm - thanks Stegall!

name: Caroline Langley
text: Joe Rider was the Technician that serviced our HVAC. He was quick to diagnose the issue, and he was very punctual. Would use again in the future!

name: Ron Inscho
text:
Friendly and helpful service.
Michael arrived within two hours of our urgent call and stayed until our problem was solved! The manager we worked with, Jerry,  was considerate of our plight and worked efficiently to help us get things resolved. This was one of those everything-goes-wrong days, and Stegall made it better.

name: Don Kraupa
text: Brandon did an awesome job and is very professional. He represents a great company, who must be proud to have him. Thank you Brandon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words

name: Holly Nealey
text: Thanks Joe Rider for your great service! Always prompt and knowledgeable about services provided!

name: Tina Howse
text: Our A/C went out last night and Joe was here first thing this morning and had it fixed before we could even blink. He identified the problem, replaced the motor and now we're in the cool again. I can't thank Joe enough for helping us out in such a timely fashion. Thank you Joe!!!

name: kaytebugg016
text: It’s late June. My house was 85°. A technician came and went and my issue was resolved within 25 minutes. He was polite, fast, and very knowledgeable. I also live in a condo so my access to the HVAC and condenser units was not the most convenient. Overall I am 200% pleased. Would definitely call Stegall again.

name: Shana Moton
text: Stegall offered excellent customer service from being on time for our initial quote, to offering the best quote we received, to being able to install our new A/C the very next day (on a Saturday!!).  Andrew with Stegall offered service with a smile, was very knowledgeable, and was very kind and upfront with us the whole time.  We were very impressed with Stegall and recommend them to anyone needing to replace your home's A/C - it's going to be a hot summer!! But, thankfully, we'll be sitting cool inside our home :)

name: Karri Hensley
text: I called Stegall for a broken AC. Joe from Stegall was at my house 2hours later and expertly analyzed my system. He gave his recommendation and I followed it. A crew from (Todd and Brandon) Stegall showed up the next day to install a blower to properly match my existing heat pump. Todd and Brandon worked in withering heat and paid attention to the smallest details, not scratching or denting my floors, or walls.  The heat pump developed another small issue and Joe came back to inspect the over all system AND fixed the heat pump issue not charging me the callout fee. Joe, Todd and Brandon are excellent at their jobs and are very personable people. Stegall is a quality company. I would recommend them to you.

name: Darren Wells
text: Stegall came out and serviced my air conditioner. Justin was friendly and honest and explained everything he was doing and gave me great tips. I'm freezing and it's hot as hell outside! Thanks Stegall!!!

name: andrea egea
text: Mr Gilbert saved us tonight. Was very helpful and warned us of possible future problems. I am not totally useless when it comes to such things. Was the first place to call us back at a bad time of day. Great job!

name: Lauren Hall
text: We have used Stegall for years for yearly maintenance and other work. Technician Joe Rider has been wonderful, prompt and walks us through any issues!

name: Mortimer Calhoun
text: I'm very pleased with the services I have received with Stegall. Great company, great staff.

name: Terry Stinson
text:
The service man today was Joe Riley. He was, as is usual for Steagall, prompt and courteous and solved my problem quickly and professionally.  He went the extra mile for the filter I needed after he checked everything out.

I find Steagall and it’s employees to be knowledgeable and prompt and professional from the administrative side to the service side.

name: Julie Dana
text: Called in service order for my hot water heater and they came out the very next morning at 8AM!  The service guys were excellent and their attitude was very customer oriented and professional.  I will call Stegall again when I need services they provide.

name: Libby Langford
text:
Got home from work and the house was 80 degrees! Called another company and they couldn't get anyone out until late if any, and would charge an emergency fee. Called Stegall, and the guy was here in an hour, and had it fixed shortly afterward. Very professional and efficient, and the price was VERY resonable! They are definitely my "go to" people in the future.

By the way, I AM a real customer that had a real problem....

name: Carolyn Lantrip
text: I came home from work one day to find my air conditioning was not working properly and I called Stegall the next day.  Two technicians met me at my home on Smith Lake in Winston County AL that evening around 4:00 p.m.   They were very courteous and serviced the unit.  They explained exactly what part had gone bad, replaced it with a new one which they had on the van and had my air back on within the hour.  The charge for the work was more than fair and I will definitely use them again.

name: Jenifer White
text: Excellent service throughout the process! Everyone was punctual, professional, and competent. After a bad experience with another company, it's refreshing to see that there is a company that can meet expectations. Great job!

name: Zachariah Seanor
text: Joe stopped by today and made sure our unit was running efficiently for our big family reunion. Thanks Joe Rider for answering my questions and not judging our messy house 😄

name: Crystal Knezek
text: Our main A/C unit stopped blowing cold air. Jeremiah came out quickly and diagnosed and fixed the problem, after another company screwed it up and tried to make us think we needed a whole new unit. Jeremiah was straight forward, friendly, prompt and considerate, and above all, he was honest. Thanks!

name: Michael Heaven
text: Great company, repairs on our HVAC were reasonably priced.  The service professional that came to our house, Joe Rider, did a great job getting our system back in tip top shape and was prompt and courteos!

name: Daniel Richards
text: They came out to service my HVAC and did a fantastic job!!  Mr. Gilbert was very polite and took care of us.  I will definitely will be calling Stegall again for future issues.

name: Rena Miller
text: The technician was great.  On time and super friendly.   So far my experience with Stegall has been great.

name: Haley Dshae
text: I highly recommend Stegall mechanical for any plumbing, electrical, and hvac needs. Honest and reliable and all around great company.

name: Susie Brasher
text: We recently replaced one of our units using Stegall. They made sure we were purchasing the option that worked best with our budget. We were very happy with the customer service and overall experience. Thanks Stegall!

name: Rod Damon
text: I have used Stegall for at least 5 years. I have used them for HVAC maintenance, new hot water tank, and electrical work and have always had great service. I have a yearly maintenance contract with them to service my heat pump. They come out twice a year and I have had less unit problems since I've gone with them.

name: Jennifer Lerma
text: I knew that I needed a new heat pump as my current heat pump was 14 years old.  When I got home from church on Sunday and it was 80 degrees in my house, I knew I could put it off no longer.  I had a quote from another company but had recently learned about Stegall through a co-worker.  They came out to my house within a couple of hours of receiving my call, confirmed I needed a new system, gave me quotes and options, helped with me financing and installed my new system, all within 2 days.  They sold me a better system and a better price than what I had been quoted by another company.  Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

name: Brewer Family
text: Stegall has been our go-to for Plumbing, Electrical & HVAC. We have an older home, so the guys at Stegall help us give it a little TLC. Brandon Jones especially will go the extra mile! Thank you guys!

name: Jerry Baker
text: They came out to check on our HVAC and serviced it with an affordable price.

name: Abigail Cole
text: Stegall were very professional. Got great service. Got a new heat pump installed, it is working wonderful.

name: Jason Echols
text: My house AC unit stopped working. I am a plumber by trade but I have no idea when it comes to hvac type stuff. I call stegall and they came to my house and investigated the problem. I assumed I would be looking at a huge bill because I have had similar issues at a different residence, and Norrell charged me $600, 3 separate times over a number of yrs. so I figured it was going to be the same ole same ole. But was wrong!!!! The technician that came out explained everything he was looking for and what I needed to look for and do to prolong my AC unit. Turns out I was not doing maintenance for the unit that I was not aware of. He fixed it quickly and in no time the unit was running properly. My wife was super excited and happy......happy wife =happy life. Lol 😂

resp.text: Thanks Jason for the kind words,please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Sara Fondren
text: Be careful with these guys. I had one of them tell me my condenser was bad and had to be replaced for $5000 when it was actually just a fuse. Get a 2nd opinion or better yet just don't bother calling this place at all.

name: Ann D
text: Have used in the past for HVAC repair and maintenance and recently used again to install flood lights, fix a doorbell and a 2 way light switch.  They did a great job as always.

name: Anderson Jackson
text: Andrew did a very good job this morning, he ansered all my questions. I would recommend Stegall Heating and Air.

name: Niaj Nia
text: The tech came in to check my unit. He diagnosed it as a leak but never found a leak. In addition to charging me for a diagnostic fee, I was charged an additional $125.00 for a "leak check". Isn't the diagnostic a part of checking to see what is wrong with the unit ... including checking for leaks? I would not recommend this company AT ALL. They are ripoffs and I am taking them to court if my money is not returned. I will be contacting them on Monday about this matter.

name: Jamie Cowden
text: Bought a service contract. They never called the number I gave them to set up appointments. When I need my ac fixed my contract is expired. I never received any service. Wouldn’t recommend a company that takes people’s money and doesn’t provide any services.

name: Jeremy R
text: Needed a heat pump and was impressed with how professional everyone was. I cancelled my other estimates and had a new heat pump the next day. Thanks.

name: Kasey Graydon
text: Stay away! Came and LOOKED at my water heater. Could not fix it and sent me a $200 bill! ???? The company that actually made the repair charged me less than they did to LOOK at it. Garbage. DO NOT CALL.

name: Buddy Estes
text: very prompt, knew what he was doing and repaired on the spot!

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

name: Marlin Headley
text: The technician, Joe, was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, arrived on time

name: Cindy Fletcher
text: Stegall Mechanical is one of the best plumbing companies around no doubt about it.

name: Stegall Mechanical
text: This is a one stop shop with experienced techs

name: Tina Smith
text: Great company!

name: Kaye Cook
text: I called nine days ago for a plumbing issue at my rental property. I was told they would be out that afternoon or the next day. No one ever showed from Stegall and no one called. This is the poorest action for a service company to exhibit.

resp.text: Ms Cook I apologize for this oversight on our side. I would be glad to help out in anyway I can to resolve this issue. Please contact My office at 205-251-0330 Doug Hinote

name: Tammy Beard
text: Everyone was very nice, they came on time, answered all my questions and did not leave a big mess behind for me to clean up.

name: Charles Cope
text: I'm not very pleased with this company...After spending a lot money

name: Michelle Hudson
text: They are prompt and professional.

name: Renee Cleveland
text: Bad all around

resp.text: I am sorry if you had a bad experience if we can help solve the problem please call the office.

name: Jimmy Bailey
text: Great service experience every time.

name: Jim Kellen
text: The word exemplary expresses the “best of its kind” which is more than merely installing equipment.  Understanding the correct technology solutions that balances our new system components with our original old components was an essential service that made our project a great success!  David Gilbert assessed our problem and recommended our solution and his installation team of Todd and Jay preformed excellent work and left everything clean!!

name: Logan Wilson
text: AC went out in the middle of the day. Joe Rider responded and had my unit fully functioning within an hour. 10/10 recommend.

name: Nicholas Danfourah
text: Jason came out to our house at 2am to fix our water heater because it was just spraying water for hours. He was able to help us stop it from leaking water so we could sleep peacefully. He was so professional and came on time. I had such a good experience with him, I am going to recommend him to anyone and everyone. He is very knowledgeable. He deserves a huge bonus and pay raise through the company because it is hard to find people like him. Especially coming out at 2 in the morning.

name: Douglas Coleman
text: Joe Rider was very professional and helpful with any questions we had. I highly recommend this company. We will be using them for all of our HVAC needs.

name: Natalie Vanderbleek
text: Joe Rider was great! Installed Nest thermostat and was patient enough to wait and make sure everything worked before leaving. Will use Stegall going forward!

name: Katrice M.
text: I wish the workers where treated better . I wish all ethnicity was treat equally. The office workers are fantastic the job site Supervisors are very much stuck in the old days.. (master can I please take a break) I think we all should be treated equally not by the color of our skin. Doesn't mean your less knowledgeable because we are not the same skin color. Respect is due to a Dog! I guess you have to be animal to be respected and treated equally. Great company site supervisors need more training on ethics and communication with the employees/ temps as well . Lets start treating each other with respect .Just because you have power don't mistreat your workers .

resp.text: Katrice we appreciate you bringing this our attention but since you are not an employee of Stegall we do not know who to contact in regards to this issue.  Please have our employee contract Jimbo Rudloff (President of Stegall).  We are an equal opportunity employer and believe in treating all of our employees the same.  Thank you.

name: Michelle Michael
text: All around best service! David was sent out to diagnose our AC problem and he pinpointed the issue and even double-checked himself to be sure. He also checked other areas to make sure there weren't additional problems. He explained everything so well so that I could understand the functionality of the system and where the problem was. A part had to be ordered and he said Stegall would send someone out ASAP. I requested that he come back personally. They managed to get the part, and David, back to our house for the installation the next day. So happy with their response time, their professionalism, and David's attention to detail and genuine friendliness. Thank you for getting us COLD air in the Alabama July heat!

name: Reid DeShazo
text: There are not enough stars that I could give to Stegall.  Great service and fantastic folks.  A pleasure to deal with.  Ken, Justin, and Hayden installed my new package unit in less than an hour.  Highly recommed!

name: Jack Boehm
text: Did nothing, charged me over the "eval" price, yet did nothing.  When called to ask about this and let them know the exact problem is in place that was when they arrived, they did listen.  Promised a call back, no call back, and certainly no refund.

name: Patricia VanHorn
text: Mr. Joe came out and did my fall maintenance today.   He did a great job, was kind and courteous left me feeling confident that with proper maintenance we wont wake up to no heat this winter.  I will use this company - because of people like Joe - for all my heating and cooling needs, and I highly recommend you do too.  Also - Joe needs a raise.  He put up with my tiny dog who thinks shes an attack dog without blinking an eye.

name: Frances Howard
text: Stegall came out  very quickly  and  determined the issue with our A/C, which was a  parts issue.  Joe Rider  our  mechanic was  knowledgable,  professional and  very  kind,  he fix  the  problem  immediately.  Our previous company wanted  us to buy an entire new unit.  We will certainly  "call Stegall" in the future!

name: Harrison Bender
text: Joe Rider is great. He has been to my home for service on multiple occasions and is always incredibly polite and on time. Service is great with Stegall.

name: Jeff Owens
text: Love this company. I really appreciate Joe and all he did to fix our air conditioning. I am so happy with my experience with Stegall and highly recommend them!

name: David Coram
text: I had an after hours HVAC emergency at my home.  It was hot and the HVAC would not come on. It was around Midnight on a Friday night when I called Stegall. Joe Rider was on call and came right out in about 30 minutes, and got us up and running in about 20 minutes.  He was courteous, kind, and had a great attitude to be up so late.  I wish I could hire more people like Joe to work for me!!

name: Drew Lansdell
text: Stegall has been very professional in my experience with them. I have requested two homes receive an HVAC inspection prior to purchase, and Joe has performed both. I would highly recommend the service.

name: Cathy Gibson
text: Woke up July 3rd. No air. Twenty guests expected for a Fourth of July celebration!  Shelly was extremely helpful in the office and Joe the technician came out and had us up and running in no time. Thanks Stegall!!

name: Susan Smith
text: Very prompt and courteous service in the middle of the night to get our air conditioning working. We were so grateful!

name: Shane Gates
text: From the office staff to the guys on the field, everyone is fantastic! I've had work in plumbing, electrical, and HVAC. Brandon, Chuck, Justin, Nick, and Quentin are professional, personable and knowledgeable. Shelly who works in the office is priceless! This company has the best employees you could ask for! I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Excellent service! I appreciate the prompt response to my initial phone call. I can't remember the last time technicians have covered my floors with protective sheets. I have already recommended them to my co-workers!

name: G Weldon
text: Have used Stegall for HVAC units, electrical needs and plumbing issues and highly recommend them!  Just today I had a plumbing issue - was able to get a quick response time, and can’t express enough how awesome and thorough Brandon and Bobby were in resolving the problem and cleaning up afterwards.  And, the fees are so much more reasonable than what I’ve encountered in the past!

name: samuel mcdonald
text: We were very impressed with Joe's professionalism and integrity as he serviced our HVAC this morning. He did a wonderful job!

name: Tony Diliberto
text: Joe and Steven we on time and very profesh. Great company!

name: janet taylor
text: I just completely replaced my central heating/air system and duct work after many years long overdue, which was a task.  I shopped thoroughly and got 4 bids, Jeremiah's bid was best as well as the install was very satisfactory with experienced professional & courteous labor.  I greatly appreciated Jeremiah's drive and honesty to give the best job for the best price.  I also recommend Carrier Infinity unit with media filter and UV light.

name: BIZ 77
text: Had an issue with my drip pan being full and needed the drain unclogged so I contacted Stegall who sent Joe the same morning to get the issue resolved quickly.  Went ahead and signed up for the two visits a year deal because I was so impressed with the service we received.

name: Lisa Churchill
text: I called 4 different companies to help me with purchasing a new HVAC unit for my sunroom. No one could help with this purchase and install - all said that the crawl space was too small for a new unit. However, Stegall said, "Yes!" The team of Jo, Todd and Justin dismantled the existing unit piece by piece and fit the new unit in this tight space. It is anyways easier to say no but so glad that Stegall said YES! It works like a charm - thanks Stegall!

name: Caroline Langley
text: Joe Rider was the Technician that serviced our HVAC. He was quick to diagnose the issue, and he was very punctual. Would use again in the future!

name: Ron Inscho
text:
Friendly and helpful service.
Michael arrived within two hours of our urgent call and stayed until our problem was solved! The manager we worked with, Jerry,  was considerate of our plight and worked efficiently to help us get things resolved. This was one of those everything-goes-wrong days, and Stegall made it better.

name: Don Kraupa
text: Brandon did an awesome job and is very professional. He represents a great company, who must be proud to have him. Thank you Brandon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words

name: Holly Nealey
text: Thanks Joe Rider for your great service! Always prompt and knowledgeable about services provided!

name: Tina Howse
text: Our A/C went out last night and Joe was here first thing this morning and had it fixed before we could even blink. He identified the problem, replaced the motor and now we're in the cool again. I can't thank Joe enough for helping us out in such a timely fashion. Thank you Joe!!!

name: kaytebugg016
text: It’s late June. My house was 85°. A technician came and went and my issue was resolved within 25 minutes. He was polite, fast, and very knowledgeable. I also live in a condo so my access to the HVAC and condenser units was not the most convenient. Overall I am 200% pleased. Would definitely call Stegall again.

name: Shana Moton
text: Stegall offered excellent customer service from being on time for our initial quote, to offering the best quote we received, to being able to install our new A/C the very next day (on a Saturday!!).  Andrew with Stegall offered service with a smile, was very knowledgeable, and was very kind and upfront with us the whole time.  We were very impressed with Stegall and recommend them to anyone needing to replace your home's A/C - it's going to be a hot summer!! But, thankfully, we'll be sitting cool inside our home :)

name: Karri Hensley
text: I called Stegall for a broken AC. Joe from Stegall was at my house 2hours later and expertly analyzed my system. He gave his recommendation and I followed it. A crew from (Todd and Brandon) Stegall showed up the next day to install a blower to properly match my existing heat pump. Todd and Brandon worked in withering heat and paid attention to the smallest details, not scratching or denting my floors, or walls.  The heat pump developed another small issue and Joe came back to inspect the over all system AND fixed the heat pump issue not charging me the callout fee. Joe, Todd and Brandon are excellent at their jobs and are very personable people. Stegall is a quality company. I would recommend them to you.

name: Darren Wells
text: Stegall came out and serviced my air conditioner. Justin was friendly and honest and explained everything he was doing and gave me great tips. I'm freezing and it's hot as hell outside! Thanks Stegall!!!

name: andrea egea
text: Mr Gilbert saved us tonight. Was very helpful and warned us of possible future problems. I am not totally useless when it comes to such things. Was the first place to call us back at a bad time of day. Great job!

name: Lauren Hall
text: We have used Stegall for years for yearly maintenance and other work. Technician Joe Rider has been wonderful, prompt and walks us through any issues!

name: Mortimer Calhoun
text: I'm very pleased with the services I have received with Stegall. Great company, great staff.

name: Terry Stinson
text:
The service man today was Joe Riley. He was, as is usual for Steagall, prompt and courteous and solved my problem quickly and professionally.  He went the extra mile for the filter I needed after he checked everything out.

I find Steagall and it’s employees to be knowledgeable and prompt and professional from the administrative side to the service side.

name: Julie Dana
text: Called in service order for my hot water heater and they came out the very next morning at 8AM!  The service guys were excellent and their attitude was very customer oriented and professional.  I will call Stegall again when I need services they provide.

name: Libby Langford
text:
Got home from work and the house was 80 degrees! Called another company and they couldn't get anyone out until late if any, and would charge an emergency fee. Called Stegall, and the guy was here in an hour, and had it fixed shortly afterward. Very professional and efficient, and the price was VERY resonable! They are definitely my "go to" people in the future.

By the way, I AM a real customer that had a real problem....

name: Carolyn Lantrip
text: I came home from work one day to find my air conditioning was not working properly and I called Stegall the next day.  Two technicians met me at my home on Smith Lake in Winston County AL that evening around 4:00 p.m.   They were very courteous and serviced the unit.  They explained exactly what part had gone bad, replaced it with a new one which they had on the van and had my air back on within the hour.  The charge for the work was more than fair and I will definitely use them again.

name: Jenifer White
text: Excellent service throughout the process! Everyone was punctual, professional, and competent. After a bad experience with another company, it's refreshing to see that there is a company that can meet expectations. Great job!

name: Zachariah Seanor
text: Joe stopped by today and made sure our unit was running efficiently for our big family reunion. Thanks Joe Rider for answering my questions and not judging our messy house 😄

name: Crystal Knezek
text: Our main A/C unit stopped blowing cold air. Jeremiah came out quickly and diagnosed and fixed the problem, after another company screwed it up and tried to make us think we needed a whole new unit. Jeremiah was straight forward, friendly, prompt and considerate, and above all, he was honest. Thanks!

name: Michael Heaven
text: Great company, repairs on our HVAC were reasonably priced.  The service professional that came to our house, Joe Rider, did a great job getting our system back in tip top shape and was prompt and courteos!

name: Daniel Richards
text: They came out to service my HVAC and did a fantastic job!!  Mr. Gilbert was very polite and took care of us.  I will definitely will be calling Stegall again for future issues.

name: Rena Miller
text: The technician was great.  On time and super friendly.   So far my experience with Stegall has been great.

name: Haley Dshae
text: I highly recommend Stegall mechanical for any plumbing, electrical, and hvac needs. Honest and reliable and all around great company.

name: Susie Brasher
text: We recently replaced one of our units using Stegall. They made sure we were purchasing the option that worked best with our budget. We were very happy with the customer service and overall experience. Thanks Stegall!

name: Rod Damon
text: I have used Stegall for at least 5 years. I have used them for HVAC maintenance, new hot water tank, and electrical work and have always had great service. I have a yearly maintenance contract with them to service my heat pump. They come out twice a year and I have had less unit problems since I've gone with them.

name: Jennifer Lerma
text: I knew that I needed a new heat pump as my current heat pump was 14 years old.  When I got home from church on Sunday and it was 80 degrees in my house, I knew I could put it off no longer.  I had a quote from another company but had recently learned about Stegall through a co-worker.  They came out to my house within a couple of hours of receiving my call, confirmed I needed a new system, gave me quotes and options, helped with me financing and installed my new system, all within 2 days.  They sold me a better system and a better price than what I had been quoted by another company.  Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

name: Brewer Family
text: Stegall has been our go-to for Plumbing, Electrical & HVAC. We have an older home, so the guys at Stegall help us give it a little TLC. Brandon Jones especially will go the extra mile! Thank you guys!

name: Jerry Baker
text: They came out to check on our HVAC and serviced it with an affordable price.

name: Abigail Cole
text: Stegall were very professional. Got great service. Got a new heat pump installed, it is working wonderful.

name: Jason Echols
text: My house AC unit stopped working. I am a plumber by trade but I have no idea when it comes to hvac type stuff. I call stegall and they came to my house and investigated the problem. I assumed I would be looking at a huge bill because I have had similar issues at a different residence, and Norrell charged me $600, 3 separate times over a number of yrs. so I figured it was going to be the same ole same ole. But was wrong!!!! The technician that came out explained everything he was looking for and what I needed to look for and do to prolong my AC unit. Turns out I was not doing maintenance for the unit that I was not aware of. He fixed it quickly and in no time the unit was running properly. My wife was super excited and happy......happy wife =happy life. Lol 😂

resp.text: Thanks Jason for the kind words,please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Sara Fondren
text: Be careful with these guys. I had one of them tell me my condenser was bad and had to be replaced for $5000 when it was actually just a fuse. Get a 2nd opinion or better yet just don't bother calling this place at all.

name: Ann D
text: Have used in the past for HVAC repair and maintenance and recently used again to install flood lights, fix a doorbell and a 2 way light switch.  They did a great job as always.

name: Anderson Jackson
text: Andrew did a very good job this morning, he ansered all my questions. I would recommend Stegall Heating and Air.

name: Niaj Nia
text: The tech came in to check my unit. He diagnosed it as a leak but never found a leak. In addition to charging me for a diagnostic fee, I was charged an additional $125.00 for a "leak check". Isn't the diagnostic a part of checking to see what is wrong with the unit ... including checking for leaks? I would not recommend this company AT ALL. They are ripoffs and I am taking them to court if my money is not returned. I will be contacting them on Monday about this matter.

name: Jamie Cowden
text: Bought a service contract. They never called the number I gave them to set up appointments. When I need my ac fixed my contract is expired. I never received any service. Wouldn’t recommend a company that takes people’s money and doesn’t provide any services.

name: Jeremy R
text: Needed a heat pump and was impressed with how professional everyone was. I cancelled my other estimates and had a new heat pump the next day. Thanks.

name: Kasey Graydon
text: Stay away! Came and LOOKED at my water heater. Could not fix it and sent me a $200 bill! ???? The company that actually made the repair charged me less than they did to LOOK at it. Garbage. DO NOT CALL.

name: Buddy Estes
text: very prompt, knew what he was doing and repaired on the spot!

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

name: Marlin Headley
text: The technician, Joe, was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, arrived on time

name: Cindy Fletcher
text: Stegall Mechanical is one of the best plumbing companies around no doubt about it.

name: Stegall Mechanical
text: This is a one stop shop with experienced techs

name: Tina Smith
text: Great company!

name: Kaye Cook
text: I called nine days ago for a plumbing issue at my rental property. I was told they would be out that afternoon or the next day. No one ever showed from Stegall and no one called. This is the poorest action for a service company to exhibit.

resp.text: Ms Cook I apologize for this oversight on our side. I would be glad to help out in anyway I can to resolve this issue. Please contact My office at 205-251-0330 Doug Hinote

name: Tammy Beard
text: Everyone was very nice, they came on time, answered all my questions and did not leave a big mess behind for me to clean up.

name: Charles Cope
text: I'm not very pleased with this company...After spending a lot money

name: Michelle Hudson
text: They are prompt and professional.

resp.text: I am sorry if you had a bad experience if we can help solve the problem please call the office.

text: Great service experience every time.

name: M Stevens
text: Professional service, prompt and efficient. Plumbing, heating and A/C repair or install.

name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service very helpful

name: GARY Busby
text: Great place

name: Jeff Roquet
text: Jen and the team at The Plumbers LLC are fast, friendly, and won’t break the bank. I would recommend them to family, friends and anyone in need of anything plumbing related. 5 Stars isn’t high enough for this company!

name: Angela Cummings
text: Did a really good job! The issue was not apparant at first, but technician kept looking for the problem using a process of elimination. We would call again if needed.

name: Frank Mullinax
text: Do not use this plumber.  The owner does not stand behind his work.  I had him come out for a Master bath remodel to replace a tub valve and re-route/rough in plumbing to a walk in shower.  His plumber that came out to do the initial work did not turn the new valve to the bath tubs water on, and after tiling up the shower and trying to turn the bath water on, there was no water.  Had to go back in through the tile and found out the valve was never turned on/tested to the tub.  The rough-in work to the shower ended up being so poorly done, we are having to hire another plumber to come out and go in through the wall to fix the shoddy work that was done.  The plumber that came out to do this initial work was too concerned with having to leave early to officiate a soft ball game.  The worst thing about it is the owner is not standing behind his work and fixing himself. He has repeatedly blown me off and will not come back out.  I could also go in to how he threatened legal action if I didn't pay him for partial work before the job was completed, but that is another story.  If he is that concerned about needing money before a total job is completed, not a reputable plumber.  Beware

name: Katherine Surrett
text: Highly recommend The Plumbers! They have done two jobs for me in the last two months- fixed a leak with our toilet and installed a new water heater. They did a great job with both! Their customer service has been wonderful, everyone I’ve spoken with has been very helpful and respectful, and they came out quickly and did a quality job. I will definitely continue to use them!

name: Meredith Peters
text: Wow, best experience with a plumber in a long time! They were here the next day as a second opinion to fix a flange on a toilet seat. We had previously been quoted almost $1000 to fix this issue, but these guys did it for $225! They were professional, courteous, and fixed it well. Definitely would use again and will recommend to anyone from now on!

name: Heather Lofthus
text: Fast, affordable service! Jen got us on the schedule as soon as I called and the next day Ransom and Jared were out to fix our issue. Very knowledgeable and polite! Will be calling these guys for all future plumbing needs!

name: Family Savvy
text: I've used Mike Myers and his team~The Plumbers~for more than 5 years. They did all plumbing on a recent home renovation, and Mike did an excellent job installing a pedestal sink atop an antique piece with marble (photo below). Whenever I text Mike, he responds quickly (often same day) and has always been more than fair in his pricing. My #1 choice for all of my plumbing needs.

name: Tyler Disharoon
text: By the far the worst experience with a plumber. Came out and gave a quote and said he would return 2 days later and begin the work. Never showed. Called to follow up and he committed to coming that afternoon. Never showed.  Called again to get him to come out. Said he’d be there the next day. Now he won’t answer or return calls. If you would like someone to start a job and never finish and leave you with water running everywhere...call these folks and they will leave you ya hangin.

name: Kim Akridge
text: Came out on short notice. Fair price to replace hot water heater. Very professional. Definitely would recommend.

name: Daniel Dyson
text: Hands down the best experience I have ever had with a plumbing company or service company in general. Call these guys!

name: Major Tom
text: Great service at a fair price. Called Mike with a water leak in the wall at 7:00am. He had at truck at my house by 9:00. The tech was very knowledgeable and did a fantastic job. Will definitely use The Plumbers again if the need should arise

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. Call us anytime with any problems and will be there as quick as possible. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Cindy Partlow
text: This is the second time that I have used The Plumbers LLC - great service both times. Mike is easy to work with. Very knowledgeable and professional. Good clean up after the work. Will use again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Cindy. We appreciate your business and kind words and hope you are doing well.

name: Rachel Beasley
text: After $350 and several visits over the course of a week including removal of fixture and scoping the lines, our toilet issue was still not resolved and began leaking blue liquid from the tank onto the floor, causing a mess for us to clean up. Hate to muddy the 5 star reviews, but $350 for multiple interruptions (and messes) and zero fix to a seemingly straight forward issue isn’t ideal for our schedule nor budget.

resp.text: Im sorry to hear this mrs beasley, i am looking into the matter , since we ran the camera down the drain i will have video evidence of that, also of the final product when we finished the job. I have the file from jan 23 .

name: Lauriann Loveless
text: So we had 5 leaks we patched, kept leaking. Had enough, called the pros.  They were here less than 2 hours, all fixed and to be honest less expensive than our patch jobs .  Trever was awesome.  They were respectful and neat. We live on a farm and they were good around the horses and dogs.  Will never do another patch job. Highly recommend. Thanks guys.

resp.text: Thank you Lauriann. Your business is very important to us. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Erik Brown
text: Trevor and Brian came over and did a excellent job! Very friendly and hard working. Great job! I highly recommend them! Thanks!

name: Marie Adams
text: They were on time and did a great job.  I would use them again.

name: Daryl Russo
text: My office hired The Plumbers, LLC., to replace a gas water heater yesterday.  Today we all walked into the office and there was an obvious gas leak.  We called them back and opened all our doors to air out the fumes. When they arrived, they could smell it as well and found the leak.  A leak they told me was caused by their installers who did NOT check their work after moving the water heater into place.  With something as dangerous as natural gas, this level of incompetency is unacceptable.

name: Robin H
text: Prompt, VERY CLEAN, honest and conservative, priced very well, answers urgent issues day or night. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them and have used them for more than 5 years for a wide variety of Services at my home and other properties. Mike is worth the wait even if he’s booked!  I trust him and his team. Very personable!

name: Dionne Lovett
text: Mike Myers first fixed my washing machine that was backing up when no one else could about 10 years ago.  I have used him since over the years for everything from toilets that wouldn't flush to leaky kitchen faucet to most recently a dangerous gas leak in my fireplace!  He is the best!  Prompt, courteous and reasonable.  I highly recommend!

name: Tam Kay
text: Very satisfied! Team of 2, came out today to install our hot water tank. They got the job done very quickly, no mess left behind, Affordable, no complications! I will definitely recommend them to everyone I know and contact them in the future!

name: Susie Shaffer
text: Great response time from Michael Myers’ team of 2 men. Same day service for kitchen and laundry room pipes backing up.  Pipes were unclogged in less than an hour, and as a bonus got some tips on how specific cleaners and chemicals  can actually add to the problem rather than eliminate and on how to do some easy preventive maintenance to keep the drains/pipes clear and cleaner in the future. Thanks for a job well done.  I’ll be calling on you all again as needed!!

name: Steven Scrimpshire
text:
I don't give 5 star reviews. Nobody's perfect. However, we had a serious grease clog in our drains from years of neglect from previous tenants of our house. These guys came and did an excellent, efficient and thorough job of making sure our problem was fixed completely. The price was very reasonable and Robert and Brian were very courteous and professional, keeping us informed as they worked.
I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: R Boyd
text: Have used this company several times. Always on time, courteous and gets the job done. My husband was here the last time they came and they explained everything they were doing or had done to correct our problem. I would recommend these guys for any of your plumbing work.

name: Matt Hadaway
text: Had a leak on Saturday. Came out within the hour and had it fixed in two. Very prompt, efficient, clean, and friendly! Will use again!

resp.text: Thank you Matt. We look forward to serving you again!

text: Mike was responsive to my call. I had gotten his name from my son who had used him for a new hot water heater installation. He was pleased and I have been as well. I had a noisy pipe problem.  Mike did not stop until he resolved it   He also replaced a small behind the sink pump downstairs.  Trustworthy and dependable

text: I can’t say enough about the professionalism and honesty of this company and the business owner. I had a lightning strike my home and Leif came out and fixed my problem in a timely manner and with a great price. Best plumbers in town in my opinion. Would highly recommend.

name: Amy Black
text: I am beyond impressed with my services completed by these guys today! As this was an all day job, Tyler, Aaron and helper were professional, knowledgeable, went above and beyond... even raked the dirt back as neat as possible! Tyler explained everything from start to finish to me and my elderly father, made sure EVERYTHING was working perfectly prior to leaving, and so very respectful! I would definitely recommend this company and crew 100%.. Great service is so hard to find, actually their service was exceptional! Will always use and pass on the good word for this company! Girls in office have been great as well!! Thank you all from the bottom of my heart!

name: Qunal Jackson
text: Prompt timing and service. Came on a holiday weekend and really did a great job. Will use again.

name: BamaMomma101
text: They were able to come out the same day. And were very courteous of the property. I will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Scott Arnold
text: I have called lots of plumbers and most you get a voice mail and no return call. This company actually has people dedicated to answering the phones...However....I called on Monday and was greeted and told someone would be back in touch that day. No one called but just chalked it up to a mistake. On Tuesday I called again and explained I didn’t get a call back and was assured someone would contact me directly. By Friday I still have not received a call back so agin I called and told them how very unprofessional this was. To this day I have yet to speak to anyone but the people who just answer the phone. Not a single person from this organization has yet to contact me......

name: Sarah Jernigan
text: They went above and beyond on a Sunday to help with plumbing issue. They also called and got MAWSS to come out and fix an issue that the city was responsible for. Kind and friendly staff. I would highly recommended!

name: Christopher Peters
text: Quick Rooter saved the day at my house. Thanks Quick Rooter!

name: Kay Wilson
text: Tyler was dispatched to my location yesterday afternoon. He did a great job and was both knowledgeable and professional. I would definitely call them again should the need arise.

name: Sean Christian
text: If I could give 6 stars I would! They were quick to respond, prices were very reasonable, and they went above and beyond to make sure the problem was 100% fixed. I would highly reccomend anyone in the Mobile County area looking for a plumber to give Quick Rooter a call.

name: Esther Binzel
text: Thank you so much for the great service!

name: Larry GRIMES
text: Spoke with very nice lady and gave me very reasonable quote. States she would call Back when tech would be available. Not long recieved call for ok. Mr. BJ arrived and was very nice and proceeded to advise what my problem was. Got right on it was very professional and courteous.  Also added some extras and completed job in very timely manner. I will advise all my friends and family to use this company. Customer service has become a lost art. But Mr BJ and lady at the desk gets a+.

name: Robin Eustice
text: I use them to support my plumbing needs at the facility I manage excellent service

name: Craig Barbarin
text:
My wife and I can not say enough about this company!! We had a issue with our hot water heater and called around for days before we were referred quick rooter from a friend. We called and they were out within a hour to quote us, and got started the next day. We had been with out hot water for a week at this point so we were already greatful for
That! They put a new hot water heater in for us like I requested.  Our hot water heater was 13 years old so I opted to change it instead of spending money on a band aid. A hour after the instal we noticed we still didn’t have hot water, they came back out immediately to check it out. Long story short we ended up actually having a small water leak hidden under our house. They spent 4-5 days doing trial and error trying to find out problem and didn’t charge us a dime extra. They went absolutely above and beyond for us. Late nights, weekends, even came out on Sunday morning one day, and only charged us for the original quote. This company treated us like a family in need, not a easy bank to nickel and dime us. They have earned all of our business from here on out and any referrals that comes our way. 5 stars!!!

text:

They aren't interested in accommodating their customer's clerical needs, but their plumbing ones. The pvc pipe they glued in is still working and they assure me they'll repair it if it fails but I doubt they could have messed up gluing a pvc pipe. However I didn't expect them to be incapable of providing an itemized receipt so they definitely surprised me.

Worth considering alternative providers.

When the day came, they were on time, and when they came across unexpected snafus they dealt with it at the same price they had quoted me originally. Also (mostly) cleaned up after themselves, didn't leave a huge mess for me to deal with. name: Steve Kendrick
text: After some major hurricane damage, I had several large companies put me on a wait-list for months.  Then when they were able to inspect the damage, they said they couldn't help me because the damage was too big.  I called Restoration Services, not only did they order my supplies and had the delivered the next week but their team did all of the work in one day.  They even helped me deal with my insurance company on getting the most current prices for materials.  I would recommend their services and will be using them in the future.

resp.text: That's fantastic to hear! We are so glad we could be of service and we appreciate and value our customers. Let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Norman Davis
text:
Restoration Services, formerly Davis Roofing, has earned my trust and continued business. Last year when a Hurricane blew through town, I had suffered roof damage along with many of my neighbors. Being fortunate and not actually displaced from my residence, I opted to wait a few months to solicit repair estimates while those who needed immediate help were being serviced.

When the rush had died down (or so I thought), I reached out to multiple companies for estimates. I quickly realized that getting someone out to even give me an estimate was going to be a challenge. Numerous companies offered to come out but none actually followed through. Until I found Davis Roofing! They arrived within a few days at the precise time I was promised. A detailed professional estimate was provided to me and my insurance company for a complete roof replacement.

Upon acceptance by my insurer, they asked me for my business.  At this point, they were the only company to respond. I took a chance with a single estimate, mostly because of promptness, professionalism and effective communication. I was not disappointed!

Driving through my subdivision, I have the best roof in the neighborhood! The price I was quoted was the price that I paid. An addendum was even sent to my insurance company (by them) for additional expenses to be paid to me. That was a pleasant surprise.

The efforts and communication of this group did not end when the job was over. I have been contacted multiple times over the last year with inquiries on my satisfaction. What more could I want? With this latest communication, I made mention of a single shingle that had slipped and looked crooked on the eve above my front door. The customer service representative promised to have the repair crew out to fix it. It happened the next day!

Folks, I don't do many Google reviews. It takes a lot to impress me! Suffice to say, Restoration Services has done so and has earned my business going forward. I like the fact that they have expanded their offerings to include electrical services as well. I know they will be there, if needed. They will be my only call! Thank you again for an excellent experience!

Norm Davis

resp.text: I am so appreciative of this most kind review of our company! It is such an honor that you took the time to express this sincerely generous compliment of our services and our staff. I took the time to share this with everyone in our company. It was such a boost for us all! I just can not thank you enough!

text: I moved into a new house and immediately a pipe burst within a week of moving in! I went through 5 different plumbers trying to get the problem fixed and they would come over to “assess the problem” then proceed to tell me days or weeks later that I have to just repipe the whole house, and would lie to me by telling me that they couldn’t just fix the pipe because I wouldn’t be able to have water in other places of the house, or they would just simply never call or text me back! But it was a totally different story when I called TLT pluming, I called them around 3pm one afternoon and he was there at 9am the next day and fixed the problem after 3 months of not having hot water! I really wish I would have know to call them first! And the cost was a whole lot better than the 14 grand the other pluming company wanted from me to repipe my house!

name: Glen Deal
text:
I called 9-1 Plumb on a Tuesday and made an after hours appointment for Thursday (all they had available at the time). I told the "dispatcher" Renee (sp?) that I had a water meter ripped out of the ground by Hurricane Sally and that I needed new meter re-installed in ground, hooked and entire new line ran to house. Requested that if anything opened up between Tuesday and Thursday to notify me.

Thursday morning Brent contacted me and said he would scope out the job and call me back. Within 15 minutes he called with a description and plan to solve the issue and that his crew (Drew and Nolan) could be onsite within an hour or so and complete the entire job by end of day.

Drew and Nolan arrived as scheduled with all necessary equipment (to include trencher) to complete the job and restore services to my home.

All of the members of 9-1 Plumb, Brent, Drew, Nolan and Renee were exceptionally professional, friendly, timely and most of all - customer service oriented.

I couldn't have asked for better.

We very much appreciate their work and most highly recommend them!!!! They will be my first call for any future issues!!!!

name: Mitch Pinkston
text:
If you are looking for a fair, honest, and professional plumber, call 9-1 Plumb.

Brent, the master plumber, explains every step of the repair process, and he ensures that the job is done in a timely fashion.  Due to poor pipes used by the homebuilder 10 years ago, our house experienced multiple leaks last fall.  Brent responded within a couple of hours of our call and was able to locate and repair the issues.  Eventually, 9-1 Plumb completed a re-pipe of our house.  We received multiple bids, and they completed the re-pipe in a quick and clean manner while also being the most cost-effective option for me.

This week our original grinder pump stopped working when it met its life expectancy (10 years).  Brent thoroughly checked every part of the grinder pump system to try to find the least costly repair.  Unfortunately, the pump was shot and a replacement was needed.  Brent was able to have a new pump and assembly installed the very next day.

I will call Brent at 9-1 Plumb for all of my plumbing needs.

text: Prompt service and great commmuncation by Lisa and the team. Thank you!

name: David Chew
text: We had a clogged toilet drain in our master bath. It has been backing up about once a month for a while. These guys came in and got to work right away. They did not stop until the drain was clear. They went through the toilet first, then the sink, then the shower, and then back through the toilet, and then up through the clean out located on the outside of the house. After all of that they went back to their office and pick up the "BIG" machine. Once they got back they ran it once through the toilet drain where it ran into the clog and cut through the major clog and clearing the pipe. We watched at the outside clean out as the nasty clog pushed on through and out to the sewer. Then we saw nothing but clear water after that. No problems since then.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a positive review.  We understand our customers concerns and try to take care of them in a professional and timely manner.  We are here if you need us.

name: Samantha Pinkston
text: I can't say enough good things about Brent and D.  I called 9-1 Plumb when we had water coming up through our hardwood floor. The dispatcher initially said they wouldn't be able to get to us until the next day, but called when they had an opening later in the day since I had mentioned I wanted same day. We had a different plumber out earlier who told us at best we were going to need a costly repair or at worst would need to redo the plumbing in the entire house.  When the source of the leak wasn't obvious, Brent was thorough in figuring out what was actually leaking and was able to do the repair easily and for a very reasonable price. 9-1-Plumb saved us thousands of dollars. I highly recommend and will use them for all our future plumbing needs.

text: I would highly recommend this company!! I had what I thought was a leaking water heater in my rental house. Water was getting under the laminate flooring. I called Doug after hours. He gave me a quote that was much less than I expected and said they could start the next day. Brent and Jake came the next morning on time and ready to work. They worked all day with only a short break. They were courteous and professional and also very neat and respectful and careful not to disturb my renter's personal belongings. The job was a 2 day job and they came first thing the next morning to complete their work and worked this day until they finished without taking a break. They showed and explained to me everything they had done. You could hardly tell there had been any work done at all, everything was so clean!! Georgia B.  Fairhope, Al

We've used Doug and his team twice and have had a great experience both times.

The first time he repaired a leak in the laundry room behind our washer which caused flooding into our kitchen. He responded quickly, after hours (at night on a weekend), and dina great job.

Today we called on him again to install a garbage disposal in our kitchen and check a leak behind our master bathroom toilet. The disposal was easy, but the bathroom was a bit trickier since he didn't know what he would find behind the wall. He walked me through the steps he was taking and provided a price range based on what he might find once he got started which was helpful. (That way we knew what the high end might be if damage was extensive or the repair was more complex than anticipated.) Thankfully, it wasn't as bad as it could have been and itwas easily fixed in one visit.

The 9-1 team is on time, professional, and affordable. Doug and his team were also very clean while working on the repairs which was much appreciated. I'd strongly reccomend the 9-1 team to anyone in the area looking for a reliable plumbing team.

I called another guy who looked at the unit and said you have a leak in a hose outside.  He could tell because leaves and dirt had settled in the spot where the hole was. He fixed in about 10 minutes and havent had a problem since.  The time before that, someone came out, and didnt bother to look at anything, and said they could get me a new unit and they would have it built on a concrete block to make it nice.  I called someone else and it was the fan motor. Offering your employees commission has really prompted your employees to become scam artist, thus making your company look bad.

I would advise anyone and everyone to stay away from this company! Poor service, poor workmanship and even worse service!

I pulled up at my house at exactly 6:40 waited a few min and went and got a package from my front door and boom there was a sorry I missed you tag!!! I could t believe how I was treated and lied to, I arrived home to the min what time I said I would which according to him would not have been more than 5 min after him...so they could t wait 5 min for me when they where at least an hour and 35 min late after having someone sit at my house waiting for them to never come!!!! It to mention my unit is a lemon that they refuse to replace that went out 2 to 3 times the very first year where they had to weld and replace parts so they could t blame those on me like they try to do now since it continues to go out a min of twice of year which they blame now on the type of air filter I have which is a load of ****!!!!

name: deb c
text: I realize some people had an experience quite different from mine, but my recent experience with Head's was quite good. I would give them 4 3/4 stars if that were an option. I recently bought a house in Mobile, and was given paper work showing the AC coils having been replaced in January 2018 by Head's, with a 10 year guarantee. On some of the 1st hot days this year, the AC did not seem to be cooling efficiently, and there was quite a lot of condensation and then ice on the lines. I called Head's with some reluctance due to the negative reviews, but they were extremely responsive, came out to the house in less than 2 hours, and were extremely thorough, professional, courteous, and pleasant. They diagnosed the problem, handled it, and then checked everything else, and explained exactly what was going on.  They even gave me a call the next day to make certain everything went well. The only reason I'd take of 1/4 star would be because there was some initial record keeping confusion, and the problem with the AC function was traced back to a cap which should not have been added/placed at the previous service due to the slightly unusual configuration of my particular AC and furnace. Luckily, the tech (Scott) was very knowledgeable and diagnosed it easily.

resp.text: We are very grateful of your review and are glad that we were able to properly diagnose and fix your problem!!

text: I had a horrible experience with this company!!!! After I complained he spent about 5-10 min. outside and said he ran a test on the unit and it was not the circuit board but the compressor and it was not under warranty.  The next day they called and said the compressor is under warranty but the labor was $750.00.  I had another company come and give me a second opinion and without even touching the unit immediately saw the problem which was a $10.00 part and had it fixed in about 30 minutes!!!!!  I will NEVER use this company again and I hate it for people who are scammed by this company.  The techs make a profit for every unit they sell/replace and its sad that people are taken advantage of like this!

She could not find the repair ticket even though I have her the invoice number and work was done almost a month ago. text: I am more than satisfied with the work Klein Plumbing did for me today.  Their workers Blake and Drew are top notch.  They fixed two tubs, a sink, a toilet, and a garbage disposal all in an hour an a half.  While they were here I asked them to look at the toilet and garbage disposal and they fixed them no problem.  I originally called around looking for a plumber to fix the tub and sink and was quoted for around $200-250.  Klein charges by the hour, but they work fast to make sure they get the job done as quickly as possible.  Even with adding the extra fixes, they would have been cheaper than the other quotes I got for just the tub and sink.  The only reason I ended up paying more than $200 is because I needed a new garbage disposal.  I would most definitely recommend Klein Plumbing to anyone looking for a plumber.  I know they will be the people I call for any future plumbing work needed.

The plumber called my cell and left a message stating he was real close to my house (20 miles away!) and did I want him to come on to my house; I never called him back.  I am very disappointed that this turned out this way after being so impressed with the first visit; but live and learn; now I have to find someone else to call.

text: The men were professional and cleaned up after themselves. My displeasure involves the fact I was told the repairs would be $175.00 per hour and it would take 2 men.  I thought fair enough. Unacceptable  will never call them again

name: Lillie Shepard
text: I had previously used Weaver Septic for a bad smell in our house after it rained and they capped our septic tank. We had to call over and over for 5 weeks to get them to come back and finish the job by capping the tank after their first visit. When the problem kept happening we called them again and they wouldn’t come out for several days, so we contacted Ultimate Plumbing and Septic who were able to come out the very next day. Brian was able to fix a pipe under our house that had a hole in it and five minutes after he left Trey called and came over to check out the septic tank. He immediately diagnosed the problem, which was the job done by Weaver. They had not sealed the caps to the tank or bolted them down, but only placed it down and covered it with dirt. This was allowing water to flood our tank every time it rained. Trey from Ultimate was able to replace caps and properly seal them and also fix an issue with the pipe leading to the tank. I couldn’t have asked for anyone to be more reliable, honest, trustworthy, and hardworking than Brian and Trey. I would strongly encourage anyone needing plumbing or septic services to give these guys a call. I could only give them a 5/5, but they are definitely a 10/10. Would highly recommend!!

name: Kathy Vaughn
text:
USE THIS COMPANY!! USE THIS COMPANY!!
They deserve more than the 5 stars allowed.
I live in Gadsden and I knew I was in the right place when I called and spoke to an actual person about my plumbing issue and not someone's voicemail. Plumbers using voicemalil to run a business is not a good look for me.  Customers are left wondering if you got the message or if you can help them.  As a result, I will definitely use and highly recommend Ultimate Plumbing for any future plumbing issues based on my experience with them. My plumber Brian and his helper were awesome!  They were totally professional, courteous, and very helpful in answering my questions. I was impressed by the quality and efficiency of their workmanship in replacing my sewer line. I am totally pleased!  Thank you Ultimate Plumbing and Septic Services  for providing good old fashioned customer service. I don't usually give reviews but I just had to applaud this company.   The owner of this company knows what it takes to have a successful business .  He has a business model that a lot of other companies could benefit from.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kathy!!
