And it was very good

name: Heather Covington
text: I highly recommend Walley Plumbing. I had a party scheduled this past Saturday at 2:00 and in the morning I discovered my guest toilet was not flushing properly. With it being a Saturday I was nervous about getting someone out quickly. I called quite a few plumbers but Tony was the first to get in touch with me pretty fast! He said we needed a new toilet, which is exactly what my mom had told me a while ago since it’s most likely the original when the house was built in the 80’s. Tony was able to schedule me for today (Wednesday) and delivered and installed a new toilet. He did an excellent job and I never knew I could be so excited about getting a new toilet! It flushes so well and looks fantastic! Tony was very professional, knowledgeable and such a nice guy! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Wow! thank you for those kind and encouraging words! We appreciate you and we're glad to have the opportunity to serve you!

name: Sandra Smith
text: Great experience. Really appreciated someone answering the phone when I called rather than having to leave a message and waiting for someone to call me back. Will definitely call again when needed.  Tyler did a great job. He was polite, respectful, and professional.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking time to give us a great rating! We are glad to have you!

name: Erika
text: Could not recommend a better company! They were picked based on their excellent reviews. We called and they immediately fit us in due to a cancellation - quite the blessing! Tyler was our specialist and he was fantastic! Very knowledgeable and explained everything in detail. I was dreading the invoice but I was very surprised how reasonable the bill was for the work they did, especially how hard I saw Tyler work at fixing the issue. Would highly recommend Walley Plumbing!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review! Were so glad to have you as our customer!

name: Deborah Cartwright
text: I have never called a plumber before. Didn’t know who to call. Wallet Plumbing was highly recommended by a friend for whom they had done work. I called on a  Friday morning. George was here in less than 2 hours. George was very friendly and professional. I had only a small quick fix but to me it was huge to get this done quickly and so well at a reasonable price. I am so very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We're so glad you called.

text: Chris was awesome!  He ended up having to replace my dishwasher after finding multiple leaks.  He left the job to pick up the new one and replaced it that night.  This was all done between 5:00 and 9:00 on a Friday eve.  I was very impressed with his eagerness to help and very satisfied with the level of service he provided.  I highly recommend using Walley Plumbing Company!

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star rating. We really appreciate the support.

text: Danny from Walley’s Plumbing was professional, courteous, and knowledgeable. He was prompt and he did a great job installing my toilets and hot water heater. We had sand in our water lines from having our field lines replaced recently. Danny helped get the sand out of the water lines and he repaired our leaking pipes and water valves. Great Job!! Thanks!

The last time I called them they were able to diagnose the problem even after the MAWSS  could not. Turns out it was the City's clogged drain that was the issue. I highly recommend them if you have plumbing problems. They also have a Youtube channel that gives you some great tips to prevent plumbing issues.

I hands down recommend Hemphill Services and will not hesitate to call them again!!

name: Chez Knox
text: Hemphill is great! They’ve done several things around a house we bought and helped with repairs on the sale of another house. They are super nice and efficient!

name: salma jabeen
text: Called a tech to address.a leak. Tech found an issue with the pipes and had to cut the tile to replace them with brand new ones which was unexpected but fine. My complaint is with the bill. We were overcharged $200 and only caught it when reviewing the itemized receipt and doing the math ourselves. They handled it once we brought it up, but it bothers me that if we hadn't looked at the bill we would have just overpaid. On top of that, $160 a hour seems unreasonable. Most places will do a plumbing job for less than $100 an hour. The leak was small and we ended up paying ~$650 for the whole thing. Good work but will likely go with someone else next time.

name: Brent Bononia
text: We discovered a leaking water heater.  Called Hemphill and they were quick to respond by sending their guys out the same day and did the water tank remove and install the next day.  Service was quick, friendly and a quality repair for a good price!  I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Originally called another plumbing company several times and couldn’t get through to get an appointment so I called Hemphill after reading their reviews. A very nice gentleman answered the phone on the second ring and was very polite and helpful. He answered all my questions and sent Adam out this afternoon. Adam was able to properly find the problem and fix it immediately. He informed me each step of the way what the issue was and what it would take to fix it. I received quality work and service and am thankful! I’ll definitely use them again for any plumbing needs in my home and I’d gladly recommend them.

name: Corey Kearse
text: Would recommend Hemphill to anyone looking for plumbing services. Adam showed up on time and solved the problem we were having with our stopped up drain. Price was very reasonable.

name: Gayle Hurley
text: I have used Hemphill for many years (12+) and have always been very happy with their work. I heartily recommend them!

name: Jacob South
text: Called Hemphill at 8:30 am on a Saturday in August because my air stopped working the night before. They were here and gone before lunch and my air is working great. I spoke with Andrew and he sent Michael out to get me back going. He did just that and did it at a very fair price. I was very pleased with their service and professionalism. I won’t hesitate to call back in the future.

name: Jennifer Wills
text: Highly recommend Hemphill services. They are professional, responsive, and honest. We have used them on several occasions now and could not be happier with their customer service.

name: M Aldridge
text: Completely replaced under sink plumbing. Wore face mask appropriately. Courteous and timely. Well done work.

Michael
U.S. Army Veteran

text: These guys were awesome! On time. Courteous. Respectful. Got the job completed quickly and explained everything thoroughly. Highly recommend Hemphill!

text: I’ve used Hemphill Plumbing for almost 10 years! They’ve worked on both houses I’ve owned in Birmingham. They’ve done big jobs and small jobs for me. I also use their heating and air services.  They are very communicative and always do great work. The one time I hired another plumber I regretted it!

name: Jake Jordan
text: I needed a new gas range installed where we previously had an electric range. Our countertop contractor recommended another local plumber to install the range, but they didn't show up and never called to reschedule. I've had good experience with Hemphill before and should've called them in the first place. Called at 9:30 and by 3:30 the range was installed which included running a new gas line to that corner of the house. Very happy with their work and the guys they sent out.

name: Gina Fulmer
text: Hemphill was great. We had a shower that wouldn’t turn off. I called Hemphill and they sent someone out that morning. The service technicians were able to identify the problem quickly and get it resolved. I definitely recommend using them.

Beautiful and scenic state park.

text: We were very pleased with our experience using Hemphill! They showed up right on time, were respectful and polite, did the job quickly, and even came in under the quoted price. We will definitely be calling this company again!

name: Crystal Shrum
text: Hemphill was responsive, reasonably priced, and the guys who came to install the ptrap for my sink were professional and so nice!

name: Kobe Singleton
text:
***UPDATE: October 20, 2020

After placing this review I was immediately contacted by Andrew. We had an in depth discussion about a few things and were able to reach an amicable understanding. They came out to give an estimate on the job October 20, 2020. Will give further updates as needed.***

***October 18, 2020

As a business we depend on other business services just as much as customers depend on us. I initially called and spoke with someone who passed my information on to the company representative. The representative called back and gave me a tentative arrival time but never showed. After continously calling, more than 3 times a day a few days in a row, the service representative (Andrew); I practically gave up on this business as an option. The unique thing is that so many people referred me to them.
(Wanted to give one star but gave two simply based on how many other people referred them).***

name: Jan Logan

name: april brand
text:
I can’t say enough good things about my experience with the team from Hemphill.  They were so easy to work with!  Unlike many other companies, they sold me what I needed for my home rather than trying  to sell me with more just so they could turn a bigger profit.  After talking with several companies their upfront/no sales pitch approach was very refreshing.  Thanks to Hemphill,  I have an awesome new TRANE heating and air system and AO Smith gas water heater.  I got great service, equipment,, and value from Hemphill.

Hunter and his team did a terrific job with the install.  They were efficient and made sure I felt good about things each step of the way.  Hunter went above and beyond to help me get everything set up on the WiFi thermostat.  I even got a visit from Chad, Vice-President, to see that the project was coming together.  Based on my experience, you will have a hard time finding a company, with better service and value.

text: Michael was very polite, explained in detail what was wrong with my unit before fixing it and what we could do to help prevent having this kind of problem in the future, he made the repair and had everything working in no time, definitely recommend using this company for any heating or cooling issues!!

text: I had Hunter out to service the AC yesterday and he asked if I needed anything else. I did need some outside water faucets replaced. Trey showed up the same afternoon and got it done in no time at all. My family has had three AC systems installed over the years and a few other service needs met by Hemphill. I appreciate the excellent service, quality work, and fair prices. Thank you everyone at Hemphill!

text: Several years ago, we needed two new Heating and Air units installed. We called 3 different Birmingham heating and air companies, Hemphill being one of them. Hemphill offered us the best price, so we hired them. They did a great job installing the units! We have since hired them for a few plumbing jobs, as well, and they did great work at a great price. We highly recommend these guys!

name: Doc C
text: Would recommend service

name: Jeremy Avant
text: These guys went above and beyond. I would give them 10 stars if I could. We had another company service our old furnace and they drug their feet, put bandaids on it, and finally said it needed to be replaced, after I paid several fees for them to fix it. So I had Hemphill come out and give me a quote on replacing the furnace. They gave me a quote Thursday evening and I had a new unit installed less than 24 hours later. Their pricing was more than fair so I had them replace my 30 year old AC unit while they were at it. Their staff couldn’t have been nicer! I highly recommend Hemphill to anyone looking for HVAC service.

name: Austin Robertson
text:
As of late summer and fall I knew that come spring 2019 I would need to replace either parts or the unit to be cool once the weather warmed up.  Little did I know that my system had decided it was not going to provide heat for the winter either!  I called Hemphill, and within one call they dispatched two guys to gather information about my system.  The next day they showed up, installed the unit in a clean and timely manner.  I would highly recommend their services for any plumbing and HVAC needs.
-Austin

text: July12,2019,I had an invoice from Glenn Jennings for $480.00.  They fired Glen Jennings after I agreed to the quote. I agreed to it. I didn't hear from the company at all.They sent another plumber and he stated he didn't know anything about the previous quote and stated he couldn't honor it. The date was around August 21. After waiting a week to get a response about the quote, I called the Roto-Rooter back and asked to speak to the manager. The manager whom never returned my called. I think this was bad busy. I called another company  called Machen Plumbing who took very good care of me. And they gave me a cheaper quote 0f $295.00. They showed me the parts prices and the problem to all of my concerns. Here are all the pictures to prove. Please trust me, Do Not Go Though Roto Rooter At All!!!!!!!!!!!!You will be very disappointment.

resp.text: Hi Brandon, thanks for the feedback.. I am sorry for dropping the ball on your job. We have corrected both the manpower and process so we can do a better job next time. Randy

text: I hadn’t been able to do laundry for several weeks. They came out and diagnosed the problem, fixed it in no time at all and had me back up and running very quickly. For a reasonable price as well. Thank you

name: Tony Cavitt
text:
The tech did a good job, in a reasonable amount of time. He was courteous and professional.
I do think $153 is rather steep for 30 min to snake/clear a grease clog.
I was put off one day from the original scheduling, which happens.
the only negative parts are: (1) when the tech called to reschedule the first appointment, i requested that he call me when he was on his way so that i could lock my watchdogs in the back BEFORE he got there. I also requested the same of the lady who called afterward to verify the appt change. Neither called before he arrived, dogs went ballistic when he turned in the drive and it was MUCH harder to get them kenneled. Very aggravating after asking both people!
(2) The tech came to my door with NO mask on expecting entry and I had to send him to his truck for a mask. We are elderly and my wife has COPD. That is irresponsible and surprising in the middle of this pandemic. It should be a mandatory requirement for Roto-Rooter...

name: Jeff Bost
text: The service man that met me at the house was 10 min late which is no big deal.  He was friendly and was 6-7 out of 10 for his knowledge of well systems.  I chose to use home advisor to contact professionalplumbers for me because it was advertised that I was to receive a free estimate for any repairs and/or services.  I then was informed at the end of his time at the residence that I would be responsible for a $122 service call fee.  Honestly it feels like a scam.  I would have never given permission for roto rooter to come here knowing this.  He was here for about an hour and 10 min. and I helped by running back and forth opening valves and turning off power to the pump.  Information is the key to good reviews and making money off of honest people...otherwise businesses are cheats and dishonest.  You have to decide as a business which you desire to be.  You will only be able to fool people who don't know any better.  It's a sad day for consumers when businesses drop to this type of low.

resp.text: Hi Mr Bost, thanks for your feedback.. I reviewed this with our Plumber and while he did perform the service he charged you for, he did not get your written approval to do the work. As such, I have removed the bill from your account. We are in the service business, our folks are trained to solve your problem.. As you said we invested over an hour of our time doing the job for you. All the best. Randy Anderson President.

text: The guys were very nice and professional.  They diagnosed the problem and explained it to me where I could understand what was going on. I highly recommend Roto-Rooter Plumbers.

text: Glenn Jennings was my technician (plumber). Before he arrived I received a text notifying me that he was on his way, and a picture of him so that I knew whom to expect. His appearance and attitude were extremely professional. Glenn is an excellent communicator who kept my expectations as a customer, right where they needed to be. An honest man with a work ethic like Glenn’s is not only a rare treasure, it was inspirational. He always answered his phone if I had a question. It was a pleasure to listen to his knowledge and expertise. I really can’t say enough good things about this man and the company for whom he works. I would recommend Roto-Rooter and/or Glenn Jennings to anyone with any plumbing/water/etc. issues. He is certainly an irreplaceable asset to any of Roto-Rooter’s potential customers. I will definitely call Roto-Rooter/Glenn Jennings first with any plumbing needs I have in the future. Needless to say, they both come HIGHLY recommended.

John Hearn called when his office said he would, and his crew called and showed up when they said they would and got the equipment ordered and his crew was here next day - got the plumbing and heat going in 24 hours, and now have a happy & warm customer.

name: Gulshan Sanghani
text: do not get anything done without an estimate or they will rip you when the first time we took an estimate he charged only a $100.00 to fix a pipe to and from the water heater and was very good and the second time we just called without an estimate to fix a leak he used my 6ft ladder instead of having his own 8 foot which would be more sturdy he mistakenly steped a foot on the urinal attachment and now its leaking and also did a replacement of an 8"to 10" 3/4 copper tubing piece in place of a shut off valve and charged $303.00 for doing this smaller job than the one he did last time .

name: Teresa “Terri” Baker
text: Have used this company several times. They have always responded in a timely manner, performed quality work, and charged reasonable rates. Thanks John Hearn Plumbing!

name: Andrea Decarlo
text: Very professional and effective. I will be using them for all my plumbing needs.

name: Kara Griffin
text: Friendly staff, great service, do recommend & will use again!

name: Randal Brown
text: On Easter Sunday April 21st  woke up to my water heater leaking. Sostarted looking for a plumber. I found John Hearn Plumbing. They are open seven days a week and do not charge more for holidays. I gave them a call. They sent so meone out. The man looked at my water heater and gave me a price of $1100. I accepted it and told him to get started. He had a hard time getting someone to open up the place to get the heater. While he was waiting on them he left to go do work at Western Sizzlin. About two hours later he came back and left the heater on my carpool and went back to Western Sizzlin. Even though I was first I got pushed back for a higher paying job. He showed back up just before dark to put n this heater. He had to put it in by flashlight because at that time the light in the utility room was blown. When he took it out of the box it was broken. He fixed it an made a notation on my invoice. So I just paid $1100 fo a brand new broken heater. When he got done that night there was still water on the floor. Could not tell at that time for there was a leak or not.  A couple of days later called them back out because there was a puddle on my carport. The same guy came out in the dark again to find a leak. He looked at the heater and sad it was not it. He looked around and decided that it was my washing machine leaking and charged me another $125. I bought a new washer and hoses and had it installed. There has been water on the floor of the utility room ever since. Monday June 17 the leak that the sad I did not have finally got bg enough that I could see it. So around 3pm I called them. They said that they would send someone out the next day and would call me before hand to let me know. At five thirty Tuesday June18th I called them back to see why I had not heard anything. They acted like I hadn't called. Someone showed up at 8:30pm and sad that the leak is on the copper pipe and s not part of the water heater and would cost me $95. I sad let me get this straight I paid $1100 for a broken heater the a couple of days later paid $125 to have him come out to fix a leak that he could not find and now you want me to pay another $95 to fix the that should have been fixed the day the heater was put in? I will never use these people again. I wouldn't use them to sweep a floor. Use them are your own peril.

name: M. Connell
text: I love this plumber! We've used them 3 times so far.  If you're in a a tight spot, He and/or his guys will get to your house as soon as they can.  They have a "we'll make it happen"  attitude, which is so lost in most buisnesses these days.  They are clean, get right to work, and always fix our problems.  We had my mom's bathroom renovated and two of the guys had to get through our TINY crawl space to get under the house for the new plumbing.  They were under there for what seemed to me like a couple of hours. Another time John stayed at our house late to fix a problem.  Amazing. I think we can't go wrong with John Hearn Plumbing.

text: Very professional and reasonable.  Found and solved our problem and made sure it was 100%.

The work they performed exceeded all of my expectations and the guys felt like family so I would not look any further if you are needing plumbing services.  Great job Patrick and special thanks to Blake who stayed after hours to finish the job!  You guys are the best!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review Debra!!

name: Dave Powell
text: The Gentleman that arrived was pleasant and knowledgeable. He advised me about my issue and recommended the repair. They would have received 5 stars if it weren’t for the fact they had to call their dispatch for a price. The on-site plumber should already know what the charge should be based upon his or her own experience. They should not have to call in to request a price for a repair. Other than that they did a quick job and cleaned up prior to leaving.

name: cassandra page
text: Initially, Professional Plumbers replaced 3shower heads and bathtub fixtures. They were very prompt, communicative, professional and easy to work with. They completed the job in a timely manner. We were not happy with the shower head in the master bathroom, no problem, they returned quickly and adjusted it. Still wasn’t happy with the flow, again, no problem, returned promptly and adjusted it, yet again. We finally decided, the shower head just wasn’t the one for us. Needed it replaced, they promptly scheduled another return date, and finally, we got it right!! All of this to say, they Chris, Matt, Ron and Jose were always professional and patient!! This isn’t our first encounter with Professional Plumbers, and we would not hesitate to refer them!! Top notch, TEAM!!!! Thank you🙂

resp.text: Thank you for your amazing review, Cassandra! It was a pleasure to serve you.

name: Andy Velazquez
text: Ron, Skyler, and Aaron did a great job! Chris helped me out as well which made this process super smooth. Very satisfied with the work, knowledge, and overall kindness.

resp.text: Ecstatic to hear this, Andy!! It's always wonderful to hear that our staff has done a wonderful job, thank you!

name: Christa Wolfe
text:
Tim was my technician.  He came in wearing a mask and put coverings on his shoes.

He took a look at my laundry list of issues.  Told me what could be done to correct them.  He was professional, quick and took pictures to document repair pricing.

They gave me a quote (with several options) and offered to do the work the same day.

Unfortunately because I have so many problems, I will need to prioritize what needs to be done first (along with my budget) but I will call them back to make necessary repairs.

I am very happy with the service and response I received.  Definitely recommend them to anyone who has plumbing issues!

name: Katie Aynes
text: Our water heater went out and they were here within an hour of my call. We had a new water heater installed and hot water again within 3 hours! Excellent service, good pricing and friendly staff. Will definitely be using again for any future plumbing needs!

text: Gene was great! He was very helpful and courteous.

text: On time & very professional.  Jose had my showers repaired & toilets fixed very promptly.  Very friendly and courteous.

name: Scott Sutherland
text: I cannot say enough about these folks! Fantastic service and Ron took the time to explain everything and walk us through the repairs. A consummate professional!

name: Frank CARRUBA
text: Jose did an awesome job identifying a water regulator that had gone bad causing my pressure relief valve on my hot water tank to leak. One replaced the the pressure relief valve, the next said my hot water tank needed to be completely replaced which I did a month ago then Plumbing Professionals was the third plumbers I have had out in the past 9 months and they were the only one to take the time to diagnose the cause of the problem rather than just replace a part or tank and say it was fixed. I will definitely be using them for any future plumbing issues!

text: Plumbing Professionals is the best around! They are quick in response and very professional. I'm big on customer service, and they exceeded expectations. They provided me with multiple options to best suit my needs. They don't hide anything from you or try to backdoor you. If you want straightforward and reliable help, this is the help you want.

resp.text: We are glad we could be of service, Mitchell!

text: Absolutely excellent service and both technicians were proficient and courteous. text: We have just moved into a new home in the area that was a newly constructed home but which did not have a hot water recirculating system as our former home had (for instant hot water). text: I took a flyer on these folks based on previous reviews and I can say I was not disappointed in the least. My original need was to unclog 2 drains. Hats off to Gene and Jose for their knowledge and professionalism, and coming up with a trick fix on the second drain, and to Chris for presenting very reasonable pricing for the whole drain and WH replacement job.

text:
I called them because they had the most positive reviews on the site.  I was excited to get my basement finished!  Given the high review I was ok with the $95 fee they charge to come out and look and estimate.  ( They did say it would come off the work amount. )

Well, I needed to move 3 pipes a total of about 6 feet in concrete.  Connect the pex host from about 20 feet away. And rough in some valves ( Shower , sink and toilet )

They quotes me 11,000 dollars!!!!! Then they said they would cut me a deal for something like 9,000 and they would offer financing.  I built the house only 2 years earlier and spent maybe 12,000 total for plumbing the entire house!! THIS IS INSANE!!  I will never pay another company a consultation fee.

Thanks, Plumbing  Professionals and Ron

text: I’ve used plumbing pros for both my business and for my residence. They are fairly priced, prompt, professional, and they do excellent work. Gene and Daniel took care of me today. Thanks guys!

text:
These guys were at my house within minutes of my call, even though it was not an emergency, with a tool belt on and ready to work.  They were the BEST of the best. It was a tough tough job but he had the knowledge and training to get the job done and he worked nonstop to get my plumbing back in excellent shape.  I wouldn't hire another now that I know about these guys and I will be bragging to all my friends about their professionalism, their patience, and their kindness.
Ron, Coop, and Aaron were absolutely a class act.

text: Our service tech Ron and Chris on the office were great. Very pleasant, positive experience!  High marks!

resp.text: We appreciate your review, Charles! It's so good to hear that our techs did a wonderful job, thank you for choosing Plumbing Professionals!

name: Onion George
text:
When something happens that makes you uneasy, like your tub stops emptying 1/2 way thru and 'your' guy is out of town till next week. So now you must reach out and find a new company to help be 'your new ' guy.
Well if you need a need a new plumber,, have no fear in choosing Plumbing Professionals.
This company was called first thing that morning and by lunch it was draining better than new.

name: Justin Lewis
text: Jose was wonderful, yet again. Not only did he help me take a vanity off my truck due to my wife being pregnant, he also helped me carry it up two flights of stairs to the upstairs bathroom where we were having it installed in my kids bathroom that has never been finished since we moved in back in September 2020. He also had patience enough to wait for me to demolish 48x 5 inches of tile and install a new subfloor before placing the vanity in. In the meantime he installed a new cooktop in the kitchen and helped me pull the old one out and drop the new one in. He also replaced a broken shut off valve in the kitchen and changed the old shut off valves underneath the new vanity to quarter turn valves. Not to mention that the work he did in November replacing my water heater and my pressure regulator saved me about $150 per month or more with my water bill in December and January. I want to thank Chris as well for pricing everything so reasonably and throwing in an extra shut off valve at no additional cost! You guys are a great team and a great company! I’ve used terrible plumbers before, so I know a good company when I find one. Bottom line is that I’ll continue to use Mr. Drippy in the future for all my plumbing needs! Jose especially thank you again from the bottom of my heart for giving my kids a bathroom of their own for years to come and helping us install a nice new stovetop for years of home cooked meals! Thanks Mr. Drippy!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Louie!

name: Ruthie Mobarak
text:
This Company is unmatched honey, suga-love!!!
From the sweet reception‘s voice on the other line during my desperate need of a plumber phone call to the technician’s clean-up...unbelievable quality service! We have used this company several times over the past few years & this is why:
You call/you better get outta your p.j.’s/they come!
Technician calls to notify you when on the way with very precise time so you not sitting around waiting all day with a 2-4 hour window of time!
Extremely Professional start to finish!
Great employees, Receptionist, Jeff, Chris & Gene to name a few!
Very nice, personable, caring & always polite!
Old-school quality that you just can’t find these days!
Not pushy & they don’t try to “stick you”with outstanding fees!
Receptionist (so sorry I don’t remember your name) but the sweetest voice you wanna hear when you’ve got major plumbing issues, just puts you at ease & gets you an appointment  with technician scheduled quick!
Chris, thanks so much for calling me before job was done to give me a quote & really helped with me to figure out what job best fit my need & oh so nice!
Jeff, very prompt & great giving my hubby an explanation of problem & what was needed to repair!
Gene, you are a jewel buddy! Found issue very quickly & got me to show me the problem & what needed to be done to repair/fix the problem! Great at all explanation’s! Told me sorry this might be a little loud! So nice! Very timely! Took a minute to love on & play with my puppy!
Oh & get this, you are not gonna believe it, but he cleaned up the entire area where the job was done before he left my house & took all the old parts & trash with him...amazing! I thought he was gonna do my laundry:)))
You see it’s just the little things in life like being nice & great customer service!!!
Love, love, love Plumbing Professional’s!!!!!!!!
Ruthie~

resp.text: Thank you so so much, Ruthie! We are so pleased you have continued to trust Plumbing Professionals over the years. We appreciate your amazing review, and we are so glad we could be of service!

text: I was pleased with the technician and his work. I rated it a 3 because of the cost just to install a faucet. Super high and definitely did not expect that.

name: Lisa Taylor
text:
We had 2 separate plumbing problems. One was a slow leak in the toilet supply line and the other was a leaky faucet handle.

Pro's: we were able to get an appointment within a couple of days of calling, they were on time, wore clean shoe coverings and were professional. The toilet supply line repair was quick and the service tech cleaned up afterward.

Cons: They wanted $185 to replace the toilet supply line and $328 to rebuild the Delta faucet (assessment fee included, which I think was $89). After declining the faucet repair, the manager tried negotiating with me on the cost, saying they'd "throw in" the supply line for free if we wanted to pay for the faucet. We decided toilet repair only.

The faucet only needed a $15 replacement cartridge that I was able to fix myself in less than 10 minutes thanks to a YouTube video.

I will not use this company again, as they are overpriced and left me feeling like they were taking advantage of my lack of knowledge about plumbing.

name: Steve Slay
text:
Plumbing professionals came out the same day I called. They fixed our problem and accurately identified some serious potential issues with our existing plumbing. They explained the issues clearly and provided several options. I was given an understandable quote (with discounts) and asked what I would like to have done. Long story short, we replaced our old, inefficient water heater with a tankless one. We also decided to protect our family and home with a maintenance free water filtration system (Halo 5).  It’s an amazing system.

Ron and Patrick stayed at our home until the job was complete and the area was clean. They arrived on time at 3:00pm and worked until 1:30am!!  Plumbing Professionals will be the only plumbers I will use. It’s nice to find a company that puts customer service above all else. They are a true class act and dedicated masters of their trade. I can’t say enough good things about this team of professionals.

resp.text: We are so excited to serve your family in providing your new tankless and Halo 5 system to greatly increase your household energy efficiency and water filtration quality! We love helping home owners get the best value for quality products and service! Thank you for your review Steve, we greatly appreciate you!

I know Chris had to be as tired of dealing with this as I was but he was fair and the company worked with me to get it fixed. They never charged additional service charges (parts excluded) and really worked to make things right. As I write this, I am confident that the issue is now finally fixed. *Fingers crossed* If anything comes up, I'll update again.

I would absolutely recommend them for your plumbing needs!! I will use them again in the future for sure! Thank you Chris and thank you Nick!

Note for everyone: If your kid ever drops a toothbrush into the tolite and it, through some absolute fluke it goes straight down the drain, make sure the plumber clears the line all the way out to the main. No matter how confident you may feel, trust me on this!

‐-----------------

name: CaptJack
text: Hey everybody hope all is well. So Ted's well we first used him over a decade ago when we took or 1863 home off well and to city water. So being a Very Old home setting back off the road it took a lot of ditch digging for new service from road and All new Pex lines in the home. Absolutely no issues until recently only to find out the company that produced the Pex sold faulty piping nationwide. So about 6 months back we found water pouring thru the outside rim of the house so I called Ted and they sent 2 young men out. Well it took quite a few trips inside and out and finally finding a hidden pin hole leak on the Pex pipe on back side of hot water heater.so replaced the bad section but my first warning about pipe issue. so a few days ago another leak spotted outside house and this time Pex line pin hole leak under the home ,repaired but again  a young man just wonderful attitude . So the following day yet another pin hole leak but again inside on Hot water heater in pipe not previously repaired so this time all the OLD Pex inside hot water area gone and replaced with Grade A Pex  thru floor to crawl space . These young men that decided to work for Ted are all very nice respectful,helpful, and just damn happy to see some young people that want to do work that most don't. TY Ted and you'll always be our go to Plumbing service. Sincerely Jack n Lisa

We thought we had a busted pipe under the house but it was only a small part on the water heater causing the leak. This saved me a lot of money. Luckily they were honest about the whole thing. A "shady" company could have taken advantage of us and we would never have known. I never felt like they were being anything but honest with us. We plan to replace our water heater soon and will be calling Ted's to help with it.

If you're looking for a plumber I think calling Ted's will put you in good hands. They were very professional. We were happy with the job they did and thought the price was reasonable.

text: The guys at Ted's Plumbing did an excellent job at my home recently. They were extremely nice, polite, and clean; it was obvious they knew what they were doing. My dealings with the owner was pleasant and informative. I will call him again if I ever have another plumbing issue and I recommend him to everyone.

name: Carrie Hudson
text: I am very pleased with my service from Ted's Plumbing.  Lee and Payton just installed my new sink and shower faucets as well as my new toilet.  They were very knowledgeable and extremely efficient!  I felt assured everything was installed properly and confident that i will not have any problems.  I will be using Ted's for all of my future projects!

resp.text: Thank you for your review and recommendation. We are pleased to hear you had a positive experience.

name: Leslie Pitts
text: Have used this company twice. Both times they were efficient, on time, and the jobs were done right. Thank you to Jake for being polite and professional.

name: Evangeline Smith
text:
I called.Teds Plumbing for a cold drip from my tub faucet that had become a hot stream. I had good results from them last year so expected the same service this year. Instead I got a guy who could not fix the problem, even after he made 2 trips to "get new parts". After he made several calls to Ted, he told me I had to have a new pressure regulator on the cold water line into the house at a cost of $450.00!
When I declined, he & Teds son tried to intimidate me by saying my house would not pass inspection without the new rrgulator. They then proceeded to charge me 225.00 for the time spent on the initial problem which they did not fix, supposedly dropped from 265.00 because they did not fix it. They did install a new flush mechanism in the toilet tank. It did not work. When I called &talked to Ted, he was rude & ugly to me. He said "I will not work on your plumbing until you install a new pressure regulator". He did send the same guys back the following day & they replaced  the flush mechanism.  They had a written statement from Ted for me to sign that they wd not be back until I replaced the pressure regulator. I will never call another plumber unless they are trained, licensed & can show me proof of those things & a written estimate. Don't be fooled like I was. These guys quote prices off the top of their heads. Beware, Oxford & Calhoun County residents!

resp.text: Because of privacy regulations, we can’t discuss any specifics about your comments. However, we want you to know that we are committed to providing high quality service and we take your feedback very seriously.

name: jacorey lane
text: The staff was very unprofessional. They didn't possess any knowledge about the kind of problem that I had. They came into my home after I had informed them that this was an outdoor issue. After hours of running in and out of my home, they finally addressed the real issue, and by then it was dark. They told me that they would have to return to finish the job. I was stuck at that point with no way to flush my toilet.  After they received payment, a neighbor told me that I could not leave the tissue and feces in my yard. I called the owner and he told me it wasn't their job to get the waste up. The owner was extremely rude and disrespectful.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Here at Ted’s Plumbing, we want everyone to have an exceptional experience, and we take feedback very seriously. We would love to talk to you about it if you would please give us a call. We do appreciate hearing about our visit so we may learn and improve.

text: Jake did a great job for me today.

text: These guys are the best! Super professional, courteous, and timely! They went above and beyond to help myself and my family! Would recommend them to everyone I know!!!!!

name: Tina Williams
text: Not a 24hr company

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Very Helpful and Honest!!

name: Professor Kellum
text: My wife called Express Rooter on the recommendation of our Foundation repair company.  She was told that they would give a free estimate on a small leak that we needed taken care of.  They came out this morning and went under the house.  When they came back out they told us that it would be 125 dollars.  The technician told us that it was just a loose connection that he hand tightened.  We were a little surprised by the 125 charge considering we had only called them out for a free estimate.  We talked to the manager over the phone and he said that it was a fair price because they had to come from Hartselle.  They also told us that if he hadn’t tightened the connection, it would have only been a 95 dollar service call charge.  No one told us anything about what was wrong or how it was fixed until we were handed the bill.  We contacted our foundation guy and asked him not to recommend Express Rooter to anyone in the Athens area, and I am refusing to recommend them for anyone.  Free estimates should not cost $125.

name: Mary Boonarkat
text:
This business came out in June to our historic home (we already know our historic home would be a little more difficult) to snake our clay pipes due to root intrusion. They were out there for 5 hours, could not find a clean out valve, so inserted the snake by moving our toilet, and then they replaced the seal. All for ~$375. Not bad! Of course we would use them again!
We had the same issue happen this past weekend. They came out for 3 hours and tried the same thing and could not get in the correct pipes since our piping is not directional, and charged us the same amount for $375 and did not do as much work as they did in June. They did not fix this issue, and they told us they would come out the next day, but they cancelled an hour before they came out the next day due to it sprinkling. They finally came out today, Tuesday, and excavated some of our backyard to insert a clean out valve. They predicted they would be there 2-4 hours. They were there for over 5 hours, dug into our backyard, and found a cleanout valve. They inserted the snake through the clean out valve and cleaned out all the roots in less than 30 minutes. They also took over $700 with them too. Not too happy about that. We invested over $1000 in this business in 4 days for there already to be a clean out valve.

name: Terrial White
text: Good business to unstop your drains

name: Baby Cakes
text: Douglas Sapp has a strong work ethic and gets the job done right.

name: Michael Sims
text:
Promised an initial appointment to my uninhabited rental property: they showed up early, started working without full discussion and approval.  I only found out too late.  When they'd completed most of the digging and destruction, they called to let me know what they were doing.  The call was about a half hour before our agreed appointment.

When I arrived to meet them at the property, they described everything that needed to be done clearly.  They promised to be completed by the end of the day.

Though the guys worked hard, and it was STUPID hot out there, the job want done.  No problem, I thought.  We made an appointment for them to come back and finish it on Thursday.  I paid them for the whole job- even tipped the worker $50 on top of it.

Thursday came and went- not even a call from them.  Wish it had worked out differently.  Three stars for the hard work, two missing for not being there when they said they would... Either time.

name: Amanda Beckett
text: Very sweet people. And let us know if they couldn't make it out or what time they would be here.

name: narwhal the magestic
text: My family has done business with this company for years, and have been very satisfied. When it was suggested we also use them they were quick and we thought efficient. We chose to have a 1000 gallon holding tank installed and while it was being installed it filled up and they charged us to pump it plus the installation. Then through one summer have had to pump it out 3 times and it’s me and my husband weekends only. After calling unsuccessfully over and over. Asking my family member that “knows them” also call to no avail. Had to hire another service to take over and pump and now repair the tank. Plumbing was never sealed off properly. Very disappointed in the lack of concern  expense and frustration.

name: Fred Patterson
text: OnTime Service is a great electrical contracting company.   Most of my experiences with contractors on the Eastern Shore have been pretty mediocre at best.   OnTime Service was a refreshing change.   They are a well established Birmingham based company that just recently branched out to Baldwin County.   They took my call immediately (unlike the other 3 electricians that never called back) and the next day an electrician showed up to install the transfer switch for my house generator.   It was pretty clear the technician was very skilled and was very pleasant to work with.   They have a preset price book, which matched what I was expecting for cost.   If you need a competent electrician that cares about customer service, give these folks a call.

resp.text: Fred, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are thrilled to hear that our team took excellent care of you, and we appreciate your business. Thank you for choosing OnTime Service!

text: They installed my septic for me and did a great job. They were very professional and comparatively affordable, especially for how quickly they could schedule me and complete the job. The crew. Was very knowledgeable and friendly and worked really hard to do great work. I would highly recommend Draingo.

name: Kwame Lee
text: The plumber was at my house for no more than 15 minutes an the problem was fixed. I would definitely use them again as well as refer them to friends an family.

name: Dan Cumbie
text: Stay away. Be aware they DO NOT clean up after themselves. Our AHS home warranty sent Drain Go of Birmingham to clear out a stopped sewer line. While the techs showed up on time and fixed the stoppage, they dumped about 20 gallons of sewage in our basement and all over a new sofa bed which either I or the techs could have easily moved out of the way. I was told as they were leaving that their policy is clean up is not part of their job. I spent more time with a shop vac cleaning and disinfecting the floors and the containers they used than they did clearing the line. They also tracked sewage through the house multiple times when they had to come upstairs to flush the lines with water.  The clean up I can handle, the ruined $250 sofa just pisses me off.

name: Tim Bryant
text: I was impressed at how professional the tech was. He explained what he thought the problem was and offered avenues to take to solve it. He was able to get the clog solved and offered suggestions for maintaining proper service.

name: kathy toney
text:
Technician was professional, pleasant, courteous, and extremely knowledgeable about the service needed. Called ahead and introduced himself upfront. (Dillon) Customer service and work performed “TOP KNOTCH”.
Will request this company and Dillon for future service.

name: Andre Brown
text: Guys were Great,  they even talked to my niece, and had a great time. They explained what happened with the old part, and how the. New Disposal would work more efficiently.

name: Oscar Morgan
text: The plumbers called before they arrived, as arranged. They were courteous, professional, and friendly. They worked hard to identify the issue and repair it. They saved me from having to pay for unneeded repairs by thoroughly investigating the issue. I will call them again the next time I have any issues.

name: Randall T
text: Dylan came out to resolve our issue. Dylan is a great guy! He was punctual, motivated, and loved his attitude!

name: Ponder The Eclectic
text: Through my home warranty this company was called and came to my home. I was informed that the fix would cost $700.00 and would not be covered by the warranty.  Another company was call for a second opinion. They came out and presented another solution. They fixed the issue (which was still not covered by the warranty) for less than half of what Drain Go asked. Govern yourselves accordingly.

name: Patrice Williams
text: Very knowledgeable guy, made me feel comfortable before we even met in person. I would recommend DrainGo to all my friends and family!

name: Simjuan Bonner
text: The 2 young men who replaced my water heater did a great job. They came right in, knew exactly what the problem was, and performed the needed replacement. They were both professional and knowledgeable about what they were doing. The rep who contacted me initially was nice and professional as well. I would def use this company again and highly recommend them.

name: Anthony Rupert
text: My house is old and two other plumbers did not want the job.  But Draingo fixed the drain problem with no problems.  My wife was very happy.  Thanks Draingo.

name: Debrita Hendking
text: I had used them before and the first time was good. This last time however, was a nightmare. I chose them for a second opinion appointment.  He brought a 6ft snake to unclog a major blockage. Of course it didn't help. He called my insurance carrier and advised he would have to go through the roof. Long story short, my claim was denied and I was told I would have to pay out of pocket. Thankfully it unclogged itself, because if not we were approaching day 7 without a toilet. If it unclogged it self, must've not been clogged enough to go through a roof. I'm just very disappointed this time around. The first guy went above and beyond to correct the issue. I didn't get the same service this time. I actually canceled my policy over this entire incident. This entire week was stressful because of a clogged toilet. I felt I had to beg for good service. I knew the diagnosis was wrong. No one has ever gone through my roof to unclog my toilet. Also, they have always cleaned up behind themselves and turned my water back on. I paid two service fee's only for my clog to unclog itself. Glad it's over.

name: Magdaline Braxton
text: Dustin is a great technician, exceeded our expectations. He went above and beyond to ensure we were satisfied with the installation. He did an excellent job explaining the technical and practical aspects of the install from beginning to end. We would highly recommend him to anyone. Very competent and trustworthy individual. Satisfied customers!!

name: M Mack-T
text: They were very quick. They definitely know qhat they are doing. They were brothers and I loved their interaction with one another. Fun, yet professional.

name: Brandon Bennigsohn
text: We sprung a leak on the water line exiting our water heater.  They were able to get out to us the very next morning and had it fixed in about 30 minutes.  Probably the easiest experience we've had with any type of home repair.  As you know, the contractors sent out from home warranty companies can be hit or miss.  These guys were a hit.  Great job.

name: kylec1701
text: Dylan, my company representative, was amazing! Not only excellent in his engineering but he used a little artistry as well in re-creating an obscure section of pipe. He completely repaired the system with very little damage to the ceiling access. Highly recommended folks.

name: Hartselle Foods, Inc
text: Our gas water heater went out and Draingo replaced it with a new unit in a timely fashion. Extremely knowledgeable. A+++

name: Sharon Stephens
text: Bubba and Josh got here quickly, found our problem quickly, and we’re extremely courteous and knowledgeable.  They also gave us an estimate on a new water heater, and scheduled an appointment to install a new water heater for us.  We were very pleased with their service and their attention to detail.

name: Chris Hollis
text: Domenic called to make sure it was okay to arrive early.. both he and the other employee were very friendly and explained what they were doing. They did a great job, cleaned up after and answered any questions I had. I would recommend this company to anyone with plumbing needs. Outstanding job. Very pleased.

name: Donnie Robinson
text: Technicians were very polite, thorough and professional. They were able to diagnose and resolve problems on first visit. My only concern is the lack of communication from the technician or company when he is running late. I had a 8:00am-1:00pm window. The technician arrive at 6:15pm. I would use the again, but definitely needs to be better communication.

name: mia kilgore
text: I didn’t decide to use the company because I would have had an out of pocket fee after my home warranty coverage and service would have taken a few days to start and complete. I couldn’t be without hot water that long. However customer service was very professional, pleasant and helpful! I will keep them in mind if I need non-emergency plumbing issues!

name: Minnie Taylor
text: The service was timely and the technicians professional. I was very pleased with the service we received.

name: Pamela Payne
text: Very professional and really love that they were so respectful.  Work completed in no time.  Would want to use again
