text: Dustin and James were courteous, professional, hard working, respectful, polite, etc... These guys were awesome. I had guest over so the timing of this was terrible. These guys got to work and got the job done like nobody else could tracing the clog all through the pipes through multiple bathrooms. I would absolutely recommend these guys.

name: Ronnie Mack
text: I am a contractor and a old customer of Phillips plumbing, they set a appointment with me and I wait all day and finally at 5:00 told me the service that I ask them for they do not preform, messed up my whole day. They have really made me think before I use them again

name: Houston Todd
text: Sent by American Home Shield. Told me my whole kitchen wall, including cabinets and countertop would have to come out to fix my leak. Told me that they didn't do that and didn't give me any suggestion as to how to find someone who could. Called another plumber who was able to fix the problem by pulling out the dishwasher and accessing the pipes through the panel behind it. Drain Go never even tried that. Cost me about 1/2 of what Drain Go quoted me and I didn't have to worry about ripping my kitchen apart. Would not recommend.

name: Yolonda Jones
text: The Tech that came to my home on 4/7/2021 was professional, knowledge and was concern for his health as well as mine by wearing a mask. I really appreciated it. He kept me informed on what he was doing, what the problem was and what he was going to do to fix the problem. I didn’t get his name, but I want to say that you!

name: Alex MacBlane
text: Called in the evening for a broken water line to an exterior spigot. The guys showed up the next morning and had it fixed in a couple hours. Offered a cheaper alternative to what I had and it works great.

name: T Stiger
text: The Drain Go technicians were very professional and very responsive and fixed my issue as soon as possible. Would recommend and definitely work with again.

name: Ben Young
text: First off, they showed up multiple after 6pm.  Then, they told me that they'd call and have to come back to determine why my water pressure was so high.  After me calling 3 or 4 times, they've yet to come back.  This isn't the first time I've had issues with daringo or they've tried to avoid work.  One time they told me to finish the repair instead of them finishing the job.  I do not recommend using them.

name: Paul Zimmerman
text: DrainGo made a very sincere effort to make my appointment despite bad weather that day and did a very thorough job bringing my water heater back to life! This was my first time using this company but it definitely won't be the last!

name: Karen Humphrey
text: Dylan and Jamey had the best customer service and knowledge I’ve ever seen. These two gentlemen was so nice and very courteous. They toke care of my problem with ease. Also, the receptionist was so prompt and nice, This the best plumbing company to use. Thank you Drain Co-Huntsville.

name: Ray Pickering
text: The plumber that you sent was excellent. He was super skilled, and very enjoyable to talk with. H actually coordinated a way to get to our house sooner than was scheduled. We consider Draingo to be most reliable and affordable plumbing agency in the Northern Alabama.

name: Gary Tilkin
text: This was a claim with AHS warranty Company.  The issue was a clogged sink.  Visit #1: The clog was not fixed and the diagnosis was the pipes under the sink needed a Sanitary T.  This was not covered under AHS.  A price was give by this vendor to put in a Sanitary T and unclog the drain. Our time window was 12 to 5, they called and asked if they could come in the evening.  We agreed.  Their Power Snake did not work correctly leading to them unwinding the unit in the Common Area Hallway for an hour.  The Sanitary T did not fix the issue. I asked if I would be charged and the tech confirmed I would not be for that second visit.  I was told they would have to cut a hole in the wall of my hallway to gain access to the pipe in question.  An access panel would have to be installed.  This would cost me in excess of $1,200.00 but they had to get the full price from their boss.  I would be called back on Friday.  No call Friday, Saturday or Sunday.  I hired another plumber at my expense for a second opinion.  They fixed the issue in 2.5 hours.  If this company would have put an access panel and cut the hallway wall, there would have been no pipe to fix.  It was behind the sink where the clog was.  My issue was a misdiagnosis that could have cost me time, holes in my wall, money and aggravation. When you use a Home Warranty company, this kind of think happens.  The "A" team is not sent out.  The Tech was both nice, friendly and respectful.  He just did not have the know how, equipment and ability to fix the issue in my place.  I am not mad nor angry.  This is simply the experience I had. Always get a second opinion.

name: monica eubanks
text: Extremely professional service. Worked with me to make sure all issues were addressed in the most economical and efficient way possible. I will be using their services for all of the properties that I manage.

name: Denise Parks
text: Great service! They were fast and efficient. I would've given 5 stars but one of the workers wasn't wearing a mask in my home. I would've preferred everyone be masked. Otherwise, fantastic service! I'd recommend.

name: Mitchelene Betts
text: Arrived on time and called ahead.  Quickly and effectively cleared the clog.  I would use them again.

name: Teresa Johnson
text: My experience was terrible. You guys replaced my faucet but my stopper is still broken. I will be canceling homeshield because they pay for nothing and I will not recommend Drain Go.

name: Charles Kitchens
text:
The technician iNformed me that I would need to contact Alabama Leak Detector to determine where the leak and then contact your company and then you could set up a time to come and make the needed repair. They are scheduled to be here Saturday.

The team that worked on my system (led by Cordell) did an excellent job. They were professional and gave me updates as they progressed. I will definitely use your company in the future for my plumbing needs.

name: Mem Willis
text: Worked very well with my home warranty. There were several items that were not covered, but they offered me a discount on those services, which made my out of pocket more affordable and doable in these COVID times. Also, they made me aware or rebates available with the new/replaced install. I felt they really cared about my business and could relate to me (the consumer). I would definitely use this company again and would recommend to anyone!

name: David K
text: Let me first start by saying that they did acceptable work and the technician was helpful. My problem with them had to do with my home warranty. The biggest part of the repair was not covered by my warranty and I knew that I would have to pay. One part of the repairs was due to improper installation/modification of the washing machine drain system. The pipes used were too small and not properly routed to facilitate adequate draining of the water. This repair is a covered repair under my contract and I printed a copy of the contract to show the technician. After the work was complete the technician said that he had tried to call the warranty company, but he was not able to talk to anyone. He advised me that if I paid the total amount that he would get the warranty part sorted out the next day and the company would reimburse me what was owed for covered repairs. I gave them two days and then I called the warranty company, their response was that no one had contacted them. I reached out to the manager of Draingo and he said that he would have the tech call in. When they did finally call in they called in with the wrong explanation of repairs and the warranty company would not pay for what they provided as the diagnosis. When I tried to call back to talk to Jason (manager?) he would not return my messages. I finally texted him and he replied that he was not going to give them "false information" just so my claim would be covered. I told him that all I wanted was for them to give the correct explanation, not a false one. Needless to say I got no where. If they are going to accept the warranty, they should work with the customer to facilitate an honest outcome with the company. I would not recommend using this company.

name: Adam Arrington
text: The plumber was very professional, down to earth, and honest with me about my plumbing issue.  He was a great guy.

name: Cheryl Solomon
text: Michael was very thorough and professional and really took the time to work out the kinks and make sure I was satisfied with their work.

name: Sally Harper
text: DrainGo installed a new sewer line from my house to the street. The plumber showed me several places where large tangles of roots had grown through the old clay pipe and totally blocked the system and could not be reamed out. The sewer line was installed accurately, but because I live on a very steep lot with lots of rock in the soil, the job was difficult, even with a tractor digging the trench and covering back the trench. The plumber left a huge mess in the yard, did not attempt to finishing grading the pile of dirt that  had developed at the bottom of the hill. It overflowed past the gutter and into the street. It's as if he tried to smooth out the worst of it and then just gave up and left it there, all mounded up. Also he didn't arrive until late in the afternoon with the tractor to cover the trench, and then ran out of time and incentive to finish the job properly. He said he was going to drive the tractor on the trailer back to Decatur that evening. Every time the tractor was needed it had to come from Decatur, which slowed down the work. As a result of the mess he left, I've had to hire a contractor to grade the dirt on the hill with a tractor and then replace the cement steps that had to be removed to get to the sewer line. The steps that were not removed have to be replaced also because the plumber's tractor broke off corners and gouged them badly. The price DrainGo quoted me before beginning was fair, but what an ordeal this has been trying to repair the damage caused by this sewer work. DrainGo should have done a much better joy smoothing out my yard before they called it quits on the job. Someone at the company should equip them with a wheel barrow too. They had a hard time hauling gravel to line the trench as required. The plumbers were nice, but I won't be using them again.

name: Lori Sissa
text: They never fixed one thing. They told me there was nothing wrong with one of my toilets and because of their negligence I had a major water leak. This is just one example of the incompetence shown by the techs Denton and jarred. Draingo walked away from this job instead of making it right. Now I am stuck cleaning up they’re very expensive mess that most definitely could have been prevented. They walked away because they need what they had done. Jason the owner was well aware of what was going on in my house over the three week time span. I do not recommend them to anyone. Horrible experience!!!  And definitely don’t reach out to the owner because he will ignore you and your concerns. They walked out of my home when I would not sign an agreement that would state that they were not responsible for the damage that their negligence caused.

name: Chelsea Ray
text: My disposal wasn't working. American Home Shield sent them out. The technicians were great! Super friendly, showed me a few tricks that could save me money in the future.

name: Katie Jackson
text: Denton from Draingo did a great job. He was responsive and went above and beyond.

name: john kirkpatrick
text: They were not on time. When he did arrive he acted like he didn’t want to do anything. I felt like I had to talk him into trying to unclog the drain. When he did finally try he stopped when he hit the clog and said it was roots and he couldn’t do anything. I got another company out that had no problem getting the drain unclogged and by the way IT WAS NOT ROOTS.   He also came in my home without a mask. Very disappointed.

name: Bruce Frasch
text: I ha e had Drain go out a few times to my house. This company was selected by my home warranty. 1st time out to look at the toilet they could find the problem even though it was not working properly. We were told to keep flushing it and it might fix itself. ( it did not). I had them come out a second time. this time they said that the system needed to have a camera look through the pipes. This is not covered by my home warranty and also Drain go doesn't perform that service. I called the warranty company to confirm. I have to call a qualified plumber to come out to diagnos my problem and then have them tell Drain Go how to fix it. They also looked at my water heater and found that it needed to be replaced. Drain Go ordered a tall 50 gal water heater instead of the short water heater. So I had to have the shelves in the utility removed for it to fit. If you have a choice I do not recommend the services of Drain Go. If you have a home warranty you will not have a choice. Good news the water heater works, bad news toilet still broke....

name: Cassandra Henderson
text: I had a phenomenal experience with Draingo Plumbing. It’s stressful when something goes wrong in your home. My garbage disposal stopped working. Draingo set an appointment for the next morning. The issue was diagnosed, Mr Doman got the part I needed, and came directly back in less than an hour to repair my garage disposal. They were Professional, fast, friendly, knowledgeable and courteous. They were the perfect solution to my plumbing problem. I’d definitely recommend them and use their services again.

name: night games47
text: We had a clog in our master bathroom caused by work done by a contractor.. The Draingo Plumber realized what was going on and did his best to help us resolve the plumbing issue and even spoke the contractor on our behalf.  They in turn realized their error and worked to fix and correct the issue.  We appreciate the attention that they paid to us and are forever grateful.

name: Eric Johnson
text: I have used DrainGo on a couple different occasions at two different properties. They are always friendly, professional and quote a fair price for their work. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Suzanne Johnson
text: I was leery about using this company because of a past experience and the reviews but I'm going to just say that everybody who worked on this water heater and then came back at the end of their day to fix the leaky tide caused by the utilities being turned on too quickly they did a great job. I read the reviews of the other people who have used this company for home warranty's. Well mine was with the Home Warranty company and I could not be happier with the outcome

name: Lisa McAlpin
text: Team was professional, came on time and did an awesome job of meeting our need.  They also cleaned up completely when they were finished

name: Raymond Washington
text:
They were prompt and efficient!!!
How do you send this to whoever is supposed to get it??

name: susieskill
text: The response time was quick. The office staff was friendly and efficient. The plumber was on time and fixed the garbage disposal. I am very happy with their service.

name: Kenny Baker
text: Had repairs for backed up septic lines between house and tank...did a great job as well as installation of kitchen sink and toilet about a month ago. Yesterday I found a busted main between the meter and house. They helped me dig it up and repair it. Response has been within 24 hours both times, was high quality craftsmanship and fairly priced. Will absolutely call them again

name: Ernie Rapiere
text: The techicians were tip-top.  Very courteous and made all repairs very efficiently.  They were good communicators and answered our questions.  We learned a lot from them that will help us prevent future cloggs.

name: Deborah McCants
text:
Sam Poe was extremely knowledgeable and professional. He repaired our toilet, repaired our leaking kitchen faucet and provided excellent tips regarding garbage disposal maintenance.
All repairs were done in a timely manner. Thanks for amazing customer service!

name: Laura Wood
text: We also used them under a home warranty. This was for my mom and dad But I was the one handling things for them... They did not actually make the repair they were wanting to charge me for something that I knew was unnecessary and after a second opinion confirmed that it was unnecessary.  They wanted to charge us $300 for the unnecessary the home warranty wouldn't cover.. I was still willing to let them fix it. I was told by them if I wasn't willing to let them do it all they would refuse to fix it. We ended up using Alabama plumbing pros and they were amazing!

name: J C (WhatCanISay?!)
text: DrainGo came out and looked at my water heater (through insurance)only to be told that because it is cold your water will take awhile to get hot. I can understand that some, but that night the kids were given a bath only for water to be cold. After further investigation the contractor did NOT turn fuse box back on to water heater!!!!!!

name: John Noel
text: Team arrived when promised and did a great job.  Also cleaned up before they left.  I have no problem recommending Draingo to anyone.

name: Mark Farley
text: Used this company through American Home Shield.  Was told that I would have $450 out of pocket expense.  I have no problem paying for services that I get but I do not like to be fleeced because the company does not like the amount that AHS pays.  When I asked the cost breakdown for the $450 they told me new valves, pan, expansion tank, and extra plumbing work to install of of this.  I got no valve or pan and the extra plumbing was 2 fittings and less than a foot of copper pipe.  If I had to go and pay retail is was less than $100 of supplies and maybe took 15 more minutes of work.

name: dan pile
text: Dyllon was awesome. I have never seen someone so enthusiastic about their work. Very respectful and honest. I also appreciate the commitment to covid protocols—-unlike other service providers I have had in the house. Keep up the good work.

name: Mike Persons
text: Very timely response to my request for service. The plumber was done in 5 minutes. Good work.

name: Shandrea P.
text:
My home warranty company sent them out to evaluate my issue with a leaking faucet. They identified the problem; HOWEVER they reported to my warranty company that the damage came from "mistreatment or abuse". This was reported to without any proof, just their so called professional opinion, which resulted in my claim being denied. I would not recommend them due to this. Now we have to pay for a second opinion from another company. We have been living here for almost 15 years and if there was abuse or mistreatment, I doubt my home would still be in livable condition or able to be insured.

I am only giving a two star rating instead of one, because they actually identified the issue.

name: David Stringer
text: Well they came in and plunged my kitchen sink for a couple minutes then lied to me saying it was not in their contract to unstop grease in my drain. I discussed this and told them grease was not mentioned. Foreign matter was excepted but no mention if grease. Needlessly to say they will never be allowed on my property again. Don’t nred idiots working on my house.

name: Christina Brewer
text: They were very friendly and helpful. They cleaned up before they left.

name: Shirley Finnorn
text: They worked overtime to get to us on the day promised. They had my old disposal out and new one installed in 30 minutes.  Came prepared with the new one on the truck. Very nice guys. I’d recommend Draingo without hesitation.

name: Nathaniel Lawson
text: Showed up 2.5hrs late.  Insisted that repair would need to be done by tearing out tile.  Reluctantly looked at crawlspace to discover there was tub access through crawlspace, but said it could not be accessed (afterwards discovered that switch could be loosened and dropped into crawlspace access).  Then plumber contacted home warranty and informed them that it was a pre-existing condition.  Saving grace was that the plumber cleaned out a drain at no cost.  Definitely would never recommend this company.  So different than excellent service provided by other companies sent by my home warranty company.   Didn't really want to leave a review, but they sent me a link to do it and so here it is.

name: Mary Carter
text:
They were nice and professional love there work I will be using Draingo plumbing again  I would   Definitely use them again

and Recommend them to others

name: SHON DAVIS
text: Brandy was great, she definitely made sure that  my bathroom plumbing issue was taken care of via phone calls

name: Rebecca Zurn
text: Picked up the phone immediately when I called.   Provided excellent same-day service,  found the problem and fixed it (was not a simple fix).   Very easy to work with, Great communication ,  reasonable price for service  and the resident at the property gave very positive feedback about their service.  Very happy, will use them again.

name: Tom Fitzpatrick
text: Although we did not end-up using Drain Go for our water heater repair, they quickly zeroed-in on what the problem was.  It turned-out our previous plumber (sent from the home warranty people) had already been paid by them to install an expansion tank so they had to send Drain Go away.  The home warranty people made the original plumber come back and install the tank they'd already been paid to install.  Drain Go was a very professional group, who arrived on time and knew what they were doing.  I say, well done Drain Go!

name: Mike Aiello
text: Very good job replacing our hot water heater.  Used the best durable parts for the job.  Professional courteous employees.  Would recommend to others to use.

name: Angela James
text: Drain Go Birmingham is awesome.  Young, energetic,  quick, professional and efficient.  I love working with this company. Particularly Sam Poe. He is the man for any job. He's courteous and knows what is is doing.

name: Michael Stephens
text: The young men were very professional and courteous.

name: Bill Elder
text: Very nice and professional.  Highly recommend.

name: ruby rikard
text: The repair men were on time. They were professional. They fixed the water heater pretty fast. I was not totally happy about how they handeled the shower, but I guess it was the best they could do.

name: Dawn Paysinger
text: Excellent service! Super nice guys!

name: Emily Kelly
text: Michael and his co-worker(didn't get name-sorry!) were very professional. On time, courteous.

name: Jackson Knox
text: Had a leak that appeared to be in basement office. The techs located source of leak in kitchen wall. They removed a small area of all drywall and repaired leak. Great work

name: merry gibgib
text: It was absolutely wonderful seeing young men working together and doing a professional job. Keep up the good work. I would highly recommend Draingo to my family and friends. Thanks again!

name: Yoni Padan
text: Great experience. The guys were very nice and immediately knew what to do.

name: Kay Tipton
text:
They were very nice, and professional.
They took the old one out and away, then installed the new one in a short amount of time.

name: Joe Stevens
text:
Very professional.  Listened to our questions.  Checked new toilet installations.  Inspected for leaks and checked roof vents.  Explained new toilet functions that differed from the old toilets.  Verified operation of both new toilets.  Since no work had to be done, their was no charge for their time.  Thank you Drain Go.
Joe Stevens

name: LaQueena “Queen” Douglas
text: Customer service was great.  Plumbers were very knowledgeable.

name: Raquel C
text: Professional and arrived on time. Dustin provided detailed explanation of problem. I now have hot water again!! Thank you!

name: Kathi Carr
text: The 2 service people were very professional and respectful of my home. Quick to find issue and repair.

name: Stacy Tyer
text: Brandon was very professional, knowledgeable, and courteous. He did not rush through the job and he provided helpful information on how to maintain my system.

name: Mark Lloyd
text: Was not willing to help with any issues....said the issue was appliance related. Which is true but there was another plumbing issues that he did not attempt to fix.

name: Anthony Evans
text: Jamie and Dustin were awesome professionals!!!  They came in and checked out water heater under a warranty replacement I had.  The gentlemen are highly knowledgeable and professional.  Stayed in contact with me thoguout the process.  Also Draingo office teams kept me informed as well

name: Jim McCoy
text: Hired Draingo to replace old galvanized water lines in my house. They were prompt and did quality work at a very fair price. I can highly recommend for any plumbing needs.

name: Anne Pratt
text: I would highly recommend Drain Go and Eric our service technician.

name: Terri James
text: The first repairman was horrible (Bo). The second 2 were exceptional. Would use them again as long as it was NOT Bo.

name: Edmonia Schuster
text: The men were efficient, knowledgeable, and professional.  They did a great job of cleaning up after finishing.  I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Lisa misad
text:
This was their return trip because they never remedied the first problem as I thought. I had issues with my toilet then and now since the techs didn’t physically see any problems there wasn’t anything they could do but accept my service call payment, yet, again. They didn’t try to snake the main line in fear of making a mess nor did they attempt to replace the toilet after I made the suggestion. I bought a new toilet, just in case. But to no avail. The techs only ran the water in the tub and sink just to make sure it’s not the sewer backing up in spite of me telling them it’s been serviced earlier. The other tech was just standing around and/or spending most of his time in the truck. I really feel that they weren’t sure of anything and didn’t really want to do any physical work. I’m investing in a more established, bonded and reputable, professional and caring plumber/company to find the source and expect my full refund from both calls.
Please don’t misunderstand the techs were not rude just uncaring.

name: Stephanie Anderson
text: They diagnosed and fixed the issue very quickly! My husband and I were happy with their work.

name: DeWitt Mullins
text: Service was limited due to having to submit photos of pipes under house to see if insurance would cover. Clogged drain was repaired where local plumber had failed. Drain Go offered to provide free estimate for replum if insurance refused to cover. The professionalism and honestly of Drain Go representative left me with peace of mind that the estimate would reflect true cost and that I was in no way obligated. All foreseeable issues with the replum were explored and explained for my benefit regardless of who I had perform the job.

name: Stacey Hawkins
text: Everyone was very nice and patient with me during my moments of frustration. Recommend them to everyone

name: Laura Gallitz
text: We used DrainGo as they were selected by our home warranty company. Our plumber came all the way from Huntsville to Irondale for us. He was thorough and knowledgeable, and was on time.

name: Tanya Lindsey
text: This company was awesome! My service guy name was Denton! He was very professional and precise. He was on time and done within 15 minutes. I would definitely use them again.

name: Thomas Meier
text: I had a water pressure issue with my upstairs and went through warranty company to get it fixed. These guys came out when it was convenient for us by date and time and diagnosed our pressure valve was damaged and they replaced it. We didn't ask them to set the pressure higher than factory so we had to reschedule for another time that was at our convenience. The guys came back and noticed the repairs made had a slight leak and fixed us up at no charge and then set the pressure. They were very professional and got the job done. Great job guys!

name: SM Battles
text: We were skeptical of Drango from a previous experience with something else, but when they arrived to work on our garbage disposal, they knew almost immediately what the issue was and resolved it immediately.  We were very pleased with they guys who did the work and the Company.

name: June Pridmore
text: Showed up in time and repaired my faucet in less than 30 minutes! Excellent demeanor!

name: Blanka Allgood
text: I was very surprised how fast and good they worked.  I'm glad it is done. Have some business cards...just I case someone needs help. Thank you ❤❤❤

name: Sandra McKenzie
text: Draingo scheduled my appointment in a timely manner. The technicians were very pleasant yet professional and resolved my issue quickly and effectively.

name: Jeff Jauken
text: Great quick job. On time. Very professional

name: Google user
text:
The plummer broke my sink while snaking it, lied about my other sink with a leaky drain to get it disapproved by the warranty company, and then, the cherry on top, took my own personal towel to mop up sewage, didn't bother to tell me, left with it, and made me call and hassle him about before he'd admit what happened to it. The company refused my request for a refund to compensate.

Very unprofessional. Hide your linen and lock the closet if they come over, else they'll use your bedsheets or sweaters to clean up after themselves.

name: Solomon Crenshaw Jr.
text: Kenny and Matthew checked all the boxes on their service call. They were very prompt, arriving at noon as I had asked them to come early in the appointment window. They came wearing face masks, which showed the greatest of concern for me in this COVID environment. They were polite and professional and quickly solved the problems we had with a pair of toilets. Well done, gentlemen.

name: David L. Hamil
text: Exceptional consultancy services. Thank you!

name: Michael Stuckey
text: Quick service, and very informative. Fixed my issue. Will definitely call Drain Go with future needs.

name: Pamela Russell
text: Very efficient. In and out. Recommend.

name: Tracy Millar
text: They were on time and professional. They had it fixed in just a few minutes! Thank you!!

name: Lee Green
text: They came and replaced my outside faucet. They were efficient and effective

name: Vicki Edmondson
text: They contacted me promptly to schedule a time for the service.  They came out the next day.  They were on time.  My disposer needed replacing.  They had one with them & took care of it right away.  I would recommend them & I will use them again when needed.

name: Helen Cephas
text: Very professional, courteous, and on time.i would recommend them

name: Crystal Poe
text: This is a very dishonest company.  My toilet was leaking and 2 guys came out and said they replaced the seal.  They left and an hour later there was water everywhere. I called back and they were not happy about coming back out.  They told me they think I might need a new flange without even looking at my toilet and asked for another $285 upfront.   I sent them home.  Very dishonest people.   Come to find out, I only needed a seal that they said they replaced but never did.

name: TaJuana Samuel
text: My water heater went out on a Wednesday night. I placed a service request through American Home Shield and they sent someone from Draingo the next day(Thursday). The technician said that the water heater would need to be replaced and it could be done Saturday. When I called to schedule an appointment I was told they do not work on Saturdays unless it’s an emergency, however the website says they perform services 24/7. A technician came out Monday to replace the water heater. Upon leaving (around noon) he noticed a leak in the yard and said we might want to call the city about it. The water department sent someone out and he said the leak was not on the city’s side but our side. I called Draingo to let them know what happened and they said they would send someone out. A technician came out at 7pm to say they could repair the leak in the morning which would be Tuesday morning. I had not received a call by 10am so I called Draingo to see if they could give me an approximate time of arrival. The receptionist said it would be between 12&5. The technician arrived at 2pm and got done around 7pm. I feel like the heater could have been installed that Saturday and especially since your website states that you offer 24/7 service. This caused me to be without hot water for 5 days and no water for 2 days. There could have been clearer communication about what time the leak would be repaired instead of me having to call to find out. There were pipe pieces and gloves left in the yard after the leak repair that we had to clean up. I don’t know why this is showing Birmingham. This was a a Mississippi location.

name: Alyssa Hutton
text: Not an easy job to fix.  Very Nice.

name: Dorothy Brown
text: When the repairman arrived they introduce themselves I then proceeded to show them what the problem was, they checked it out worked on it and inform me what else needed to be done they were courteous

name: Norman Williams
text: Everything was grea. The technician was fast and efficient

name: Sheila Ray Montgomery
text: My plumber is the best! On time, respectful,  honest...

name: Lisa Farnsworth
text: Fast service. Installed faucets, dishwasher, shower fixtures. Great price.

name: danielle prude
text: I’ve used them for the past 6 years. It’s always been a pleasant and professional experience.

name: Benita Mahan
text: Service technician, Denton, was exceptional and professional

name: Jen Salverson
text: They came out on Christmas Eve. Very professional.  DrainGo in Huntsville is highly recommended.

name: Mom of Two Goldens
text: Great experience. Quick work.

name: Brenda Long
text: The young men were professional, and mannerable. They answered my questions they were helpful. Thank you!

name: Lavita Oliver
text: Professional service. Complete repair. No issues.

name: Chris Geloneck
text: Very professional. Found  problem quickly ..

name: Nick Seamon
text: I have had the same experience that many others have posted here. I don’t know if Drain Go doesn’t like handling home warranty issues, but I was assigned them twice by my home warranty (2-10). Both times they missed their five hour window (I’ve never had a company quote such a wide window). When I called the lady in the office didn’t want to tell me anything and was rude. Both guys that came out couldn’t wait to get out of my home with my service fee. I’m fact, the last time, the service manager came and just  stood in my kitchen and told me that it was probably just a pipe loose (which it wasn’t, thanks to Plumb-Tech- see my review for them). I then called and spoke with the owner who told me to start another request with the home warranty and they would come back out and not charge a service fee. But he hid behind the home warranty as why they didn’t do anything, even after he said his service manager should have at least checked the pressure regulator. I would give them a zero if Google would allow it. I paid them $150 for two visits and got nothing, while I paid Plumb-Tech $175 and got all my problems fixed and was even educated on plumbing on my 30 yr old house. I don’t see it as a lost, because I would have gladly paid Plumb-Tech $325 for their work. Just sad $150 of that had to go to this worthless company.

name: Shanda Shelton
text: Excellent service and professionalism. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of plumbing services.

name: Kadie Smith
text:
I used this company because my home warranty company engaged their services for my water heater claim (a pilot light repair). Initially the service provided was decent and pretty quick. However, the very next day my water heater started spewing water--a problem that never happened before their repair. When I submitted a follow-up claim for the spewing water, they neither treated it as an emergency  (their solution was to turn ALL the water off in my house until they could come out more than 24 hrs later) nor did they feel that there was any connection between the spewing and their initial fix (even though this problem never happened before the fix to the pilot light). When I was told I could speak to a manager to voice my dissatisfaction, I siezed upon the offer--only to told the manager would call me back "shortly"...and I still haven't heard from him.

Perhaps they do a great job if you are a direct customer. If you are sent there by a warranty company, though, be forewarned.

name: Carol Davenport
text: Repaired leak under kitchen sink. Great job!

name: Dan Cumbie
text: Stay away. Be aware they DO NOT clean up after themselves. Our AHS home warranty sent Drain Go of Birmingham to clear out a stopped sewer line. While the techs showed up on time and fixed the stoppage, they dumped about 20 gallons of sewage in our basement and all over a new sofa bed which either I or the techs could have easily moved out of the way. I was told as they were leaving that their policy is clean up is not part of their job. I spent more time with a shop vac cleaning and disinfecting the floors and the containers they used than they did clearing the line. They also tracked sewage through the house multiple times when they had to come upstairs to flush the lines with water.  The clean up I can handle, the ruined $250 sofa just pisses me off.

name: Denise Mcneil
text: The technician was very friendly and he unclog my sink and garbage disposal in 30 minutes. I'd use and recommend this company.

name: Kadie Smith
text:
I used this company because my home warranty company engaged their services for my water heater claim (a pilot light repair). Initially the service provided was decent and pretty quick. However, the very next day my water heater started spewing water--a problem that never happened before their repair. When I submitted a follow-up claim for the spewing water, they neither treated it as an emergency  (their solution was to turn ALL the water off in my house until they could come out more than 24 hrs later) nor did they feel that there was any connection between the spewing and their initial fix (even though this problem never happened before the fix to the pilot light). When I was told I could speak to a manager to voice my dissatisfaction, I siezed upon the offer--only to told the manager would call me back "shortly"...and I still haven't heard from him.

Perhaps they do a great job if you are a direct customer. If you are sent there by a warranty company, though, be forewarned.

name: Nanette Frazier
text: They were very responsive and work with me about scheduling and coming back to finish the job. They were also knowledgeable about project and I would call on them again

name: Regina Matthews
text: My Sink and Shower are Draining  smoothly..

name: Jay Campbell
text: They did a great job on both my repairs.

name: Ted Darby
text: Denton Hooper was our Technician that came out on our AHS warranty service call when our water heater died on Saturday morning. He took care of the leaks and was back a couple of days later to change out the hot water heater and piping. Great job! Great attitude! Great customer service on site and on the phone with him and the office. The lady that took care of our scheduling was so nice. Really appreciate how we were handled. Thank you so much!!!

name: Marie Griffith
text: They showed up as scheduled and fixed the gasket on the toilet. They were professional and friendly.

name: Anil Patel
text: This guys were rude and fraud once come for repair given different options and asking for bribe out side contract work to make extra money. It’s not trustworthy company I would suggest anyone not use even through home warranty company.

name: Mike Jennings
text: Great service , professional highly recommended

name: Darcy Massey
text: Everyone was nice, but they came at least 4 times to fix a small leak in our basement ceiling. The day after they left again, for the same problem, the leak in the ceiling sprang open and was severely leaking in 3 seperate places, including the one that they had already "fixed".  It was before 8 am, so we called the our regular plumber (we used Draingo because they're through our home warranty). We paid someone else $290 to get this leak fixed. Had they fixed it the first time, this could have been avoided. Also, when we were explaining the situation to our regular plumber, and stated that the work was done through our home warranty, he said "lemme guess, Draingo?". Apparently they already have a bad reputation, and being through the home warranty doesn't mean that are a quality company. I will not be using Draingo again.

name: Mark P
text: Two service technicians showed up to do a repair for a leaking toilet. Come to find out it was the toilet flange that was broke. Repair technician said I would have to pay 285.00 for the repair and that was a half off price. We have a warranty company and in the outline it was covered but they would not do the repairs without payment. Then when the technician submitted the paper work to the warranty company they lied and said the toilet was over tightened that’s why it was broke. When he was taking the toilet off he specifically stated that the bolts were not even tight when at my home. This guy flat out lied and the way business was conducted I would not recommend this place for anyone I know and in the future I will let others know the same, dirty business stay away. Glad my warranty company reimbursed use for this nightmare so we could get a professional out that knows what to do.

name: Julius V Cook Jr
text: The tech was very knowledgeable and professional.

name: Quintin Milton
text: Our technician was Domenic, who came out on time and was very professional. We had issues with both showers and they both were resolved by the time he was done.

name: melinda rodgers
text: They fixed my drain without any hassle. I have used them twice in the past and they have been very professional with great workmanship!

name: Richard Van Puymbrouck
text: The reason I said I didn't use this company and gave a 4 star is this,  they came out under the presumption that my home warranty told them that all they need to do is to snake my toilets.  But what I actually needed was my septic tank pumped.  But they could not because their pump truck was down.  So I had to use a new contractor.  Not their fault.

name: Kathleen Rose
text: They did a great job.

name: Regina Shadwick
text: Sam was very courteous and professional. He explained everything and got the job done quickly.

name: David Hart
text: These guys were efficient, to the point, and professional. Will call them again any time.

name: Mark Wetzbarger (Gizmo256)
text: Timely, efficient,  and excellent work.

name: Cassandra Baldwin
text: Honestly it depends on who u get. Pretty much what all the negative reviews say. For one exception if you get a gentleman named Sam Poe u are in really good hands. But for the rest of the company i would give a negative 5 stars if it was possible. Sam Poe was sent out on the third trip to fix a clogged drain. Yeah i said "THIRD" trip, but it was like night and day. He was punctual, he cared, he listened, not to mention he had the problem fixed within the hour. So i give props to Sam Poe, he deserves a raise. The only reaspn i gave 3 stars was because of him i figured an average of negative 5 stars and like 8 stars for him came out to a 3.

name: C J K
text: WAY OVERPRICED. I had Drain Go and another company give me an estimate on a bathroom, Drain Go was $1100 more and was only going to do a third of the work and wasn't going to supply a toilet, sink, shower fixture or run a gas line like the other company (that I've used in the past) was going to do.

name: Marvin winfrey
text: Great professionalism and expert service from the technicians. They explained the problem and told me what thwe cause and repair was for the issue.

name: karen rogato
text: Believe the bad reviews on this company. This company was contracted to our home with our home warranty.  This company was hired to locate a leak in our basement, my husband told the “plumber” where he thought it was coming from(washer connector) in laundry room, bc there was a small drip of water on pipes. This man took a look at the dripping pipe downstairs , walked upstairs looked at wall in laundry then said he would have to cut a hole in our wall, cut a hole then said he couldn’t determine leak and would have to send a crew the following week to use a camera to find that way. All the while he was on the phone with someone asking what he should do/look at, we had no confidence this man even knew what he was looking for. The next day I receive a call from home warranty stating this company has determined the leak source as a pre-existing condition and would not be covered on the warranty. This was concerning to us because, firstly when the man left no source was determined which is exactly why he was sending a crew out the following week to further investigate. We found it odd that we were told when he left he couldn’t find the source but warranty company was told one thing so it wouldn’t be covered. When I spoke to warranty company they determined that the “pre-existing” claim was false based on the written findings that clearly stated no source was found. Warranty company attempted to even contact Draingo with no avail. I cancelled any further contact with Draingo and hired my own trusted plumbing company. Who by the way took one look at washer box and knew exactly what was wrong and fixed within minutes. No need to cut holes in wall or camera... from other reviews and my experience I believe this company esp. when they find out it’s associated with a home warranty will claim “pre-existing” to get more money from you. Not only that but the employees are grossly incompetent.

name: Zach Smith
text: Beware if you get assigned this company through American Home Shield.  They are obviously in cahoots with AHS such that their mission is to make sure your repair is not covered by the home warranty.  They found a broken sewage pipe at my house which literally just had to be replaced with an identical piece of pipe.  However, because Drain GO insisted on calling the direct replacement a "modification", it was not covered under the home warranty.  I imagine they are very good at manipulating words like that where they know it will cause the repair to fall outside the scope of the warranty.  Even though it is an outright lie, you have no recourse to challenge them on it since AHS accepts their lie at face value.  I would recommend calling your own plumber rather than spending several days trying to work through these liars and thieves only to have them tell you that you owe money out of pocket because they were allowed to falsely represent the situation to AHS.

name: Don Champion
text: Repairman diligently worked to find the problem (and solution) to our decreased water pressure with hot water!!  Thank you!!

name: Dayle Reed
text: The 2 young men were awesome

name: Thomas Douglas
text: Outstanding service/performance.

name: David Fallin
text: Quick, professional and quality service.

name: Tyrone Huffin
text: They were able to come to the house to repair the leak in my kitchen, unplug my sinks in the bathroom and figured out the problem with my clogged shower, and gave me a quote for the fix to the problem.

name: CA
text: Didn’t make the 5hr window they originally quoted, but the job was successfully completed when they finally arrived.

name: Rae R
text: Drain Go is highly unprofessional and utterly lazy. The plumber showed up and informed me of the issues I had placed a service call for. Refused to address all my concerns that I wanted addressed. Do absolutely NOTHING. The office could care less when I informed them of the lack of service. I suggest to run from this company unless you like to throw money down the drain.

name: Debra Straniero
text: They were kind, courteous, and quick!!!

name: Juanita Merritt
text: Wouldn't use this company  again wrong problem they said water heater broken but this wasn't true had a busted water pipe.

name: Tide Roll
text:
BEWARE IF YOU HAVE HOME WARRANTY
They know very well that home warranty will give them the competitive payment so they will try to find things which are not covered in the CONTRACT and will charge you ENORMOUS AMOUNTS for that (even if it is a simple fix).  Your out of pocket will be hundreds of dollars even for a small fix.  If HOME WARRANTY recommends them then ask warranty company to recommend some other contractor.

name: Mardess Tolbert
text: Dominick was awesome...

name: Catherine Reese
text: Great service !

name: Priscillia Johnson
text: Drain/flush hot water heater

name: Tory Moody
text: I initially got service with Drain Go through my homes warranty; they were called to fix the pipe under my wife sink, and while the initial problem was fixed they informed me of another problem they found... the sink bowl itself had corroded and was leaking as well; the guy at the time said that he would call my warranty to see if installing a new sink would be could, turns out just faucets and pipes are covered but not a sink installation. So I decided to TRY and do the sink replacement myself; I had atleast some knowledge enough to replace a sink, but I found yet another problem... The water valves under the sink has sceed so I couldn't turn off either one; at that point I decided to call Drain Go directly and see if they would install the sink and new valves, and not only did they agree but they agreed to do it on a weekend which is when they're closed and reserved for emergencies. So our service guy Matthew Jones showed up; took a look at the issues I wanted fixed, and set right to work. Maybe three hours later (the new sink wasn't a exact copy of the old so there was some adjustments) he had it all set in and connected; he had looking like the new sink had already been there, and that's what you call professional! I hope Drain Go doesn't mind me saying this but I really wanted to tip Matthew; we did tip him $8 when I really wanted to give him $10, but I only card my debit card on me and my wife only had $8 bucks on her. We really appreciated Matthew; for not only the professional work, but for coming out on a Saturday no less to get it done. Highly recommend; definitely will be using there services again!😁👍

name: Bruce Bernard
text: On time professional  thorough

name: Michael Price
text: Cleaned out septic solid tank.

name: Van Booth
text: Prompt and fast!

name: Tina Townsend
text: Kade and John were amazing, when the company sent the wrong part they called me right away and let me know, they also made sure  to get my repair scheduled for next morning, I will definitely be calling for all future plumbing needs.

name: Tanya Sanders
text: "Service guys were prompt, professional, to the point, handled business and was on their way!". Recommend and give a five star! 🌟

text: Prompt and fast!

name: K- Proverbs 3:5 C-RR
text: Great work!!  Friendly & prompt!

name: David Freisen
text: Horrific bait and switch company. They were called to my house to do a minor repair that was covered under a home warranty. They called in an issue they knew would get declined. The repair man then told me that he could still do the work but it would cost $690. I told them to leave and hired another plumber that did the work for $109. I would NEVER use them and if your home warranty company offers to send them to your house, refuse and ask for anyone else. Worst company I have ever dealt with in Alabama.

name: Joy Mellon
text: VERY PROFESSIONAL TECHNICIAN WHO QUICKLY DIAGNOSED THE PROBLEM!

name: Mike Harper
text: Very unprofessional. Technicians came in and caused more damage to my sink by trying to Jerry rig the system instead of actually fixing it. I would give them lower than 1 star if I could. DO NOT use this company

name: Jerry Slaughter
text: The technicians that came were friendly and took care of the issue quickly. 4 stars because I was told to expect someone between 8 and 5 and they didn't call to let me know they were on the way until just after 5. I understand busy, just call me and keep me updated is all I ask.

name: Tony Paige
text: Very satisfied with the service

name: Alonzo Coleman
text: First plumber rold me he would have to tear threw my wall and replace the shower parts for an " extra fee " not covered by the home warranty company (American Home Shield). A week and half later a Second plumber is sent to my home because the first plumber is " no longer with the company " and gives me the same spill but DOUBLES the price. I cancelled further service with these CROOKS and dropped American Home Shield right afterwards. GOOD RIDDANCE!!!

name: Rickey McNutt
text: Great job

name: Scott C.
text: The gentlemen who responded were awesome.  They were very knowledgeable and friendly, keeping us informed every step of the way until our problem was solved.  I will use Drain Go for all my future plumbing needs and will definitely recommend them to my friends and family.

name: Beverly Osborne
text: They were very professional

name: Vernitta Mccain
text: Quality work!

name: Ciera Morris
text: Did not fix drain properly just patched it up and take your money. I would not recommend anybody to use this company.

name: Kari Carter
text: BEWARE!!!! I filed a claim for a slow draining toilet and stoppage through my home warranty, and they sent Drain-Go. The two men from Drain-Go told me I needed pipes replaced because sewage was leaking,  and  I needed a camera ran through to determine how much pipe to replace and my home warranty was going to deny it because it was outside the home. They quoted me an outrageous price to come back and fix my stoppage. I read the other reviews about their fraudulent practices with home warranties and decided to contact another plumbing company. The plumbing company I contacted did a clean out onsite and found some baby wipes causing the stoppage and no leakage!!! It cost me lest than a fifth of what Drain-Go quoted me!!!! I wish I had known to refuse Drain-Go and ask for another company beforehand. Proceed with extreme caution if you patronize this business.

name: Mike
text: Smooth transaction.  Jamie is a very competent and professional plumber!  He made  our water heater replacement a great experience.  He arrived early and was finished quickly!  Great job Drain Go!

name: J.P. Westfall
text: I was put in touch with Draingo through a home warranty program. The technician came out and had to check two items one was the flexible sink hose that was not covered by the warranty. I understand that not being fixed. The issue I have is the other leak he was checking. It was an interior pipe going to the outside hose connection. The technician did not even bother to turn on the water to find where the leak was. He saw the stains on the outside and assumed it was the hose bib. If he had bothered to turn on the water and checked for leaks he would have easily found out that the leak was in the interior piping. Now I am out the service fee and still have leaky pipes. Do not use this company they don’t care about fixing anything they just want to get paid.

name: Earnestine Cartier
text: Best company

name: Diane Smith
text: Drain Go arrived promptly, calling ahead just before they got there.  The technician was friendly and professional.  The work was completed to our satisfaction.  Thank you for good service.

name: Teia Williams
text: These guys were very unprofessional when they showed up to my home.  I advised that my husband was pulling up to let them in and they left anyway.  They did not give him a chance to get there to open the door and would not answer the phone or return my phone calls.   I will definitely be filing a complaint with American Home Shield.  I have never had this happen before.

name: Brittney Legg
text: Draingo sent Donn and Jared and they were professional, friendly and did a great job. Fixed everything on the list with Old Republic plus a leaky faucet. I would use them again and certainly recommend these guys.

name: Robert Beck
text: The team was timely. Easy to work with. Really knew their products. Double checked to make sure all was working right. Friendly. Showed they cared about customers.

name: Stacy Hudson
text: These folks came to our home on an "Old Republic" home warranty call.  They came within the window of time that was stated and called 15 minutes prior to arriving.  They replaced a sink disposer that had been leaking as well as a leaking faucet.  They were fast, efficient and polite. No problems at all.

name: Robin Fink
text: The two service techs were really friendly and personable, efficient, and clear about what the issue was. They even spotted some other plumbing issues that needed to be addressed. Thanks!!

name: Jennifer Beane
text: Shane and the other very nice fella went totally out of their way to get the problem right on a hot Friday afternoon after 5:00. He and the crew made SURE I had hot water before the weekend and didn't get ripped off. Start to finish, a new water heater in no time. Thank you so much to Shane and his crew!!

name: Nero Birmingham
text:
AHS sent these guys to give a second opinion for a plumbing issue.  The appointment was scheduled for between 12p and 5p.  At 7:45am, they called my wife (not the primary number on the account) to let her know they were 30-40 minutes away.  An hour and a half later, they show up right as I'm supposed to be getting online for a work meeting.  I let them in and show them the toilet that was having the issue.  I went back upstairs to call into the meeting.
15-30 SECONDS later, they come marching upstairs and one of them says that the other had to take a call.  So they go out to their truck.  They sit in the truck for 15 minutes or so.  I went outside after my meeting and let them know I was free to talk whenever.  5 minutes later, they drove off without saying anything else to me.  They gave the same opinion as the first plumber, which I explained to them was wrong and why it was wrong.
This company is obviously in the pocket of American Home Shield.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY IF YOU ARE WORKING WITH A HOME WARRANTY.

name: Nicholas CaJacob
text: Excellent communication. The work was done quickly and professionally. Will definitely use Shane again for future projects.

name: Nero Birmingham
text:
AHS sent these guys to give a second opinion for a plumbing issue.  The appointment was scheduled for between 12p and 5p.  At 7:45am, they called my wife (not the primary number on the account) to let her know they were 30-40 minutes away.  An hour and a half later, they show up right as I'm supposed to be getting online for a work meeting.  I let them in and show them the toilet that was having the issue.  I went back upstairs to call into the meeting.
15-30 SECONDS later, they come marching upstairs and one of them says that the other had to take a call.  So they go out to their truck.  They sit in the truck for 15 minutes or so. name: britney lewis
text: I only gave the 2 stars because the receptionist answers the phone. Guy came out on Friday about my hot water heater. It’s now Tuesday & he has failed to even call the order in to my warranty company to get the work approved. It’s now Tuesday & I’m still without hot water due to his lack of attention on the matter. & as a business when I called a third time before I even complained you would think they would have tried to address it.

name: Jp
text:
Jamie at drain go went above and beyond and did a Great job installing our 2 new water heaters.

I was referred to drain go by American home shield like many others on here and I was very skeptical and worried based on some of the reviews I read about this company.

However, not only was Jamie very friendly but he did an excellent job and really went above and beyond.  First of all, he drove more than an  hour commute to get to my house and arrived on time Friday evening before Easter.  When I complained about the brand of water heater (due to bad online reviews) they had ordered to replace my heater that had gone bad. He agreed to send the delivery truck back and pick up a better more reliable brand of my choosing at the warehouse himself and bring it back to my house at 7:30am on Saturday morning (his day off) so that he could install it before we left town for Easter.

He arrived promptly at 7:30am like we requested and installed the 2 new upgraded heaters.  The old ones were very difficult to remove due to the location of the units and Ac vents.

The units are working great and the installation is now up to the more recent code requirements.  In the end we were very pleased and with the American home shield insurance paying for the broken one We  now have 2 new water heaters for thousands less than it would have cost with the quote from "On time Service".

Again very pleased with work and attitude throughout.  Would definitely use again!

Btw in looking back it seems most of the bad reviews came a year ago, so maybe they have upgraded their staff and Service since then.

name: Jason Hebert
text: He did a pretty good job.  Called about 10 min before he arrived.  Was polite and got our shower unclogged successfully.  Only reason for not 5 stars is that I wish he would have put things back together after he was done.  I had already removed p-trap under sink and cover for shower drain when I was trying to unclog so I left them open for him to access more quickly.  Would use again.

name: Karen Newman
text: Old Republic Home Warranty sent them to replace my hot water heater. Explained everything, did the work and cleaned up in about 1-1/2 hours.  Great job guys!!

name: Keith Marks
text: A Drain Go plumber fixed a leaking pipe at my house on December 28th but had to cut a hole in my ceiling to get to it.  The plumber told me to call them back in about 3 days so they could get someone to come fix the hole in my ceiling.  I still have a hole in my ceiling and dealing with the people from Drain Go has been one of the worst experiences of my life. My wife spoke to the plumber today (again) and he told her "I am a plumber.  I don't fix holes".  Not only will I NEVER do business with Drain Go again, I will certainly discourage anyone that I know who has a plumbing issue, not to use them either.

name: Bobby Brown
text: They asked me to ensure I had a person at the home between certain times. My wife stayed all day and they tried to call me while I was at work. When I attempted to call them back no one answered. They didn’t even attempt to go to the front door and knock. Bad company, bad policies.

name: Cindy Shaw
text: Responded quickly and didn't hesitate to repair more than originally called for. Would definitely use again.

A. Spencer

text: This company is unprofessional, dishonest, and incompetent.  They have recommended repairs I did not need and visited twice saying they were going to fix something; only they did not have the necessary parts.  They put my faucet on backwards and they left dirty parts on my bathroom counter.  Jacob, one of the workers is one of the rudest and inarticulate people I have ever met.  He is like a character off a television show about uneducated hillbillies.  I am not even sure what he is saying half the time.  They were sent to me by American Home Shield. This company has no obvious oversight.  American Home Shield is always doing business with shady companies, but this is next level bad.  BUYER BEWARE.

name: ARTISTIC INTELLIGENCE
text: AWFUL!!!! They made our problem worse!!! Ran off with our money and we haven't heard from them since. Not only was the problem worse but they left a mess.  Good thing we had everything in a row that proved their faulty job. Not allowing this to rest until matter is resolved.

name: sarah pauline
text: DrainGo operated with immediate and professional service. Seth was professional, friendly and successful with my claim.

name: BM Media
text: This company is very rude to its customers.  While they fixed my issue they wouldn’t listen to me when I knew the issue.  They treated me like I was a stupid person that didn’t know what I was talking about.  They even said my “mind was playing tricks on me”.  Turns out I was 100% right I’m what I said the issue was.  The quality of work was fine but the attitudes and cockyness was terrible.  The main guy does good work but he come across very jerky and like a know it all.  I would not use them again and have filed a formal complaint with American Home Shield who suggested them.

The only reason they get one star is because I can not give them a zero.

name: Capital Publishing
text:
Drain Go has the worst customer service ever. This Jacob character came to our house to service our hot water heater. He told us to grab a hose pipe and drain he tank ourselves. I never thought I would pay 100 bucks to AHS so that I can be the one to do the work. Then he had an apprentice start the draining process on our hot water tank.

He then tells us that we need modifications and would we be willing to pay 400-500 dollars today. He never even physically touched or got close to inspect the unit!!! We said let us call AHS first before we shell out any money.

He told us no need to do that. He then gathers his things and heads to his work can. Looks back and tells us to call him when we are ready to pay the money for the work. He leaves. The hose pipe was still connected to the water tank and running. He left it like that.

We call AHS. Jacob then calls us back irritated and frustrated. Stating that he told us so. And now it's gonna be more expensive and blah blah blah. Soooooo. unprofessional. It's amazing that some service based companies are on a Neanderthal level when it comes to professionalism.

I refuse to patronize them. And reason the comments below. I can see that this Jacob character has ticked off others as well. Great job Drain Go. We will take a cash out option and get the work done ourselves.

name: Denise O'Rourke
text: Walked in our house, blamed water coming from pipes on a full septic tank and left.  We had the septic tank unnecessarily cleaned.  Waste of $400 because septic tank guy said it wasn't that full and stoppage was in the house.  Waited 2 days for Draingo to show up and we have to wait 3 more for new plumber!!

text: This is a bad company that American home shield sent to fix my leaking pipe. First off I told the plumber I would be right back for a second to go put on some clothes. I call them back and they say they can come tues.  They expect us to go without water for 4 days?  With all the bad reciews i highly doubt they are soooooooo busy they cant come for 4 days and I'm not waiting around for them to just not show like they seem to like to do.  Thankfully old republic is good about just assigning another vendor.

name: Amber Godwin
text:
Buyer Beware. My roommate and I had plumbing services completed by Daniel Madden. It was extensive work and he had to dig up the yard but we were happy with the original services rendered (he had also come recommended by a friend).

We recently put the house on the market and the inspector found the plumbing issue was fixed incorrectly. My roommate contacted both the owner Lenny and his son Daniel and they agreed to fix the problem. They have rescheduled multiple times and are no longer returning any calls.

It turns out that he did the same thing to my friend and I read another review online saying they skipped out on faulty work and didn’t return calls.

I feel we have been taken advantage of by a professional and essentially scammed out of $1500. My next steps unfortunately are to contact the BBB, Jefferson Co., and a lawyer. We simply want the plumbing fixed as was originally promised.

I highly recommend finding another plumber to do your work. I have attached pictures of text messages showing Daniel not responding after saying he would complete the work. I will update this review if Lenny or Daniel rectify the situation.

resp.text: Hello, amber my name is Jon Madden the owner of Madden Plumbing Servives, Inc.
