We would recommend Affordable Plumbing, Heating & Air to everyone. This was our first experience with them. The technician was on time and tried everything he could to fix the issue but, he couldn't. He got Ralo to come and see if he could fix it and he did. We couldn't believe how long and hard they work. It was in the evening and we didn't think they would work that late. Ralo explained everything to us and was very knowledgeable. Thank You again Ralo for getting our issue repaired and we now having running water.

Brian & Joyce Mahan

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with your service.We hope you wont need us in the future but rest assured we are here if you do.

name: Kendra Perry-Mullis
text:
Kendell was awesome. He was very professional and respectful. He identified the
AC problem and spent a long time getting it fixed. He could have just told us that we needed a new one, but he didn't. He fixed it and then wrote down several options for new units, when we need one. When we do need one, we're definitely going with Affordable Plumbing. He was very knowledgeable and had great customer service skills.

name: Jane Kauffman
text: Whole house recipe done quickly and efficiently. Also installed a new disposal and new water box for washer and dryer.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you were with you service. We hope you have a wonderful day!

name: Margaret Penton
text:
Michael from affordable plumbing did an outstanding job!! I was very impressed with his kindness and knowledge of the field. I was also very appreciative that he wore shoe covers to protect my floors!! I would recommend this company to anyone in need of a plumber! I will be requesting Michael again if we have any other plumbing issues! Thank you, Affordable Plumbing!!

Truly!!
-Margaret

name: Alex Place
text: Matt c in Daphne, Al was amazing! He and his team came and had our problem fixed in an hour!

resp.text: Matt is a valued team member! Thank you for letting us know that you are pleased with the services he provided for you!

name: Gabriel Dombroski
text: I uh kinda work there but I love it tbh

name: Donald Yarborough
text:
Michael was very helpful and knowledgeable about all aspects of the job. Really liked that he checked everything inside and outside of the house for any issues. Gave me great options on what I needed to fix and the VIP plan was great. I can get both plumbing and AC repairs under one roof . Which is very cost effective.

Kendell did an awesome job at giving me several options to repairing by AC issue. I would highly recommend this company due to the time the techs take to explain all the issues they found and then give you options . Most companies do not do that anymore. I can tell both Michael and Kendell where well trained in customer service . Great job !!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback on your service visits!

name: Ms Love
text: The service was great and He was able to find the problem quick and resolved the issues ASAP In a timely matter. Overall I was well pleased with the service and He was extremely nice...

name: Pamela Swarat
text:
The first time I called I was treated with respect and told the truth. Sylvia was amazing, and what a great attitude.
Rollo is a Hall of Fame employee. He explained, the said Summer will call in AM. Summer call bright and early. Work was done by Noon
Very professional. No plumber in the area can match the overall experience you provide.

name: Terry Sutton
text: Ralo Brault was awesome! Very positive person! Very rare these days! Explained everything he needed to do  were I could understand it! He's a very hard worker and I vote to give him a raise in pay!!! Just love him!!! 😎 Thank y'all so much

name: Pamela Southern
text: Affordable Plumbing personnel are very professional and quickly respond to your call. They provide a courtesy call when they are on their way, which is helpful so you know to prepare for them. They provide quality work at a reasonable cost. We love Affordable Plumbing!!

name: Preston Hanne
text: Michael S. was great and diligent with the work he performed.  What seemed to be just a simple clog turned into something more complicated and any Southerner knows that working in the humid South isn't fun (especially for hours on end).  I've used Affordable Plumbing for all my plumbing needs and will continue to.  Upfront with fair and competitive pricing plus professional work.

name: Darla Dean
text:
Ralo, the Affordable Plumbing technician, arrived at the designated time. He was clean, professional and spoke to me in a manner in which I would understand the task at hand. Ralo quickly began work, located the leak and made the necessary repairs. He even made suggestions for added improvements.

I have ALWAYS been pleased with the services received by the team at Affordable Plumbing....and HIGHLY recommend them!

name: Carla Thomas
text: Blake was professional, on time and a great communicator. He did the maintenance on our hvac system and also did a dryer vent/duct cleaning, which was sorely needed!

name: Haley S
text: I was very impressed with Affordable Plumbing. The customer service is excellent, and the technician worked quickly and explained everything thoroughly. The technician even changed gloves frequently and disinfected the bathroom after working in it during the pandemic. They did not try to charge emergency visit fees either. Highly recommend.

name: Brenda McDonald
text: Technician was prompt, knowledgeable,  & extremely helpful in resolving my issue.

name: David Younce
text:
Michael Newton was our service rep this morning. He arrived on time , very polite, professional and explained what he would be doing in detail. We were glad to see he had on protective mask in compliance with COVID guidelines. He adequately explained the costs involved and then finished the job in a reasonable time.
I would recommend him and Affordable.

name: Susan Boteler
text: I was very pleased with the service I received from Affordable Plumbing. Their technician, Joseph, was very professional and respectful. He explained everything before and after fixing the problem which I appreciated very much. I would highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you for your recommendation! Have a wonderful day!

name: Phillip Bates
text: Ralo did a great job replacing my grinder pump with a new model.  He was courteous, friendly and efficient.  He made sure I saw that the new pump was working and cleaned up after installation.

name: D H
text: Tech was awesome explained every step clearly with a professional attitude , job was done in an excellent time frame , helped with clean up and now affordable plumbing in in my contacts for when my needed 😁👍⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Admin Admin
text: I called them to help me find a water leak. The girl that made my appointment was very polite and professional. They called 30 minutes prior to coming out and even sent me a text. They sent Michael out and he did a great job! Very professional, knowledgeable, and friendly. The fee charged was very fair.  Would definitely use them again.

name: Patty Smith
text: Joseph was amazing! I had a leak between floors. He came out, found the leak and went to work taking care if it. The whole experience, from the girls in the office keeping in touch with me regarding Joseph's arrival,  was simply phenomenal! I would absolutely use Affordable Plumbing again, if needed!

name: Tim Mac
text: Excellent professional and timely service!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kimberley Yeager
text: Blake with the Affordable Plumbing HVAC team was on time, trustworthy and informative. I would not want anyone else maintaining my system.

name: Dara Smith
text:
I was very concerned when I found my 15 year old water heater leaking in the attic and if it worsened, damage could be catastrophic. I was relieved that Affordable worked me into  their full schedule that very day. Matt Cook arrived promptly and professionally installed a new water heater and a flood stop water safety device that put my mind at ease about any damage occurring in the event of future leaks. Matt even gave us advice on how to fix a small problem we had with our fridge that enabled us to fix that problem ourselves and avoid an expensive call to an appliance service.
I will use Affordable in the future and recommend them to others.

name: ShaNeia Lawrence
text: When I say great service that would be a understatement. Michael was the best I’ve ever experienced. Usually when you have plumbing issues you are afraid and the anxiety of what needs to be done overwhelms you, yet Michael knows the meaning to fix the customer first. His thoughtfulness was appreciated and gave me the knowledge I needed to know where I stand and how we can move forward. I cannot praise him more as he renewed my passion for customer service as I teach it daily to others. Thank you also Rain aka Sprinkles 🤣 you all were great and even though it’s a catch 22 saying this, I can’t wait to see you again 🤣

name: Kathryn K Redstone
text: Polite, prompt service- he fixed the leak, checked all plumbing, extremely professional and thorough.

name: John Whetstone
text: Ralo Brault and the worker that came with him did a great job!!! They fixed our hot water heater and also gave us quotes for work that needs to be done. Thank you Affordable Plumbing for responding so quickly.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, we are glad you were pleased with your team of plumbing technicians!

name: Joe Meyer
text: Good job quick and efficient

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Arthur Lopez
text:
Ralo was very professional, very experienced and very knowledgeable.

He troubleshot my problem in many ways to determine a proper repair.

Ralo cleaned up after himself and was courteous at all times.

Good job.

name: Keith McElligott
text: I had tried everything I knew to solve a problem with a toilet but had no luck. I called Affordable Plumbing for help and they sent Matt. He inspected the system and determined the problem may involve the pipe installation beneath the house. He then rearranged the pipes to a more correct installation and the problem was solved! Matt did a great job!

name: Pat Smith
text: Our plumber, Ralo, was exceptional.  He was friendly, helpful, professional, and thorough.  We were extremely satisfied with Affordable Plumbing’s Service!

name: donna johnson
text: Matt is a professional technician.  Job was done professionally and quickly.  Will use again

name: Angela Talbert
text: Michael Newton was extremely professional and polite. My house presented him with a very difficult situation but he kept at it until the problem was resolved. I highly recommend him!

name: Robert Young
text: Michael, the Tech, assessed the issues carefully and gave us priced options that were clear. When he returned as scheduled, he did the work promptly and explained everything. Would highly recommend Affordable for their crew and communications system. We even received a picture and name of the assigned tech before he first arrived.

name: Gregg van Kipnis
text: Unlike two well known competitors, there was no runaround and delay. They committed to a time, arrived, made the repair in short order and charged a reasonable price. Many thanks to Austin and Drew two clean-cut diligent workers.

name: Jake Markris Fairhope Fishing Company
text:
Technician was fantastic! The problem was they were trying to charge me over $430 to replace a Moen shower handle cartridge. I called their office to make sure that was correct and the girl said “yes that’s correct, parts are really going up and we only make a 20% profit.” I decided to just pay the service call and get the part myself.
This is the best part: The supply store where I got it didn’t charge me for the part. They stated it was a warranty part and Moen does not charge for them. He gave it to me at ZERO charge and I went home and watched YouTube and finished in just a few minutes.
This company can NOT be trusted. There is no way this was ethical. I can’t imagine the people they take advantage of. I’m very disappointed and will not use them ever again.

name: Mark Nichols
text: We called at 8am. The phone service was extremely helpful and efficient.  I received a call within the hour letting me know who was coming and how soon to expect them.   I received a text with a photo of the tech coming with his name for verification.   Michael came out to our home almost immediately after that call and text.  He was professional, well educated and very informative.   He quoted a price and even as things changed (very little I must add ) the prices stayed the same.  I worked the service industry for over 20 years and as the face of the company it’s important to keep your word and satisfy every customer.  Today I was satisfied.  For once I received the service I once gave with pride.  The installation was clean, neatly mounted and professionally completed.  I would have been proud of the work if I had installed it my self.   I highly recommend affordable plumbing and will return as a customer

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Nichols. Our goal is 100% satisfaction guarantee. Michael is very detail oriented which helps him achieve this goal.

name: Dennis Groebe
text: We are very happy with the work accomplished by Ralo. He was extremely efficient and friendly. Thank you for having good employees.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you were with Ralo's service!

name: Elizabeth Nelson
text: tony did a great job of installing, repairing, and explaining what he was doing & why.  I highly recommend him and the company he represents.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know hole pleased you are with Tony!

name: Frederick Kuykendall
text: Michael Schultz was a complete professional. On time.  On schedule. Great work. Good price. More than professional and very knowledgeable. Will recommend affordable to friends and family. Thank you.

name: Celina Knipper
text: Before calling, you should know that the "24 Hour Emergency Service" they advertise is only available if you pay to be a part of the "VIP Program". This would have been helpful to know prior to spending 10 minutes of my time on the phone with a call center, giving out all my information including phone, email, mailing address, birthday and the problem I was having only to be told I don't qualify for their service because I don't pay them to be a part of the "VIP Program". In short, don't waste your time with them if you have a true emergency.

name: El Paisita
text: Called about getting a tankless hot water heater installed on Friday and the job was complete Monday at 2pm . I Highly recommend this business. They have very knowledgeable certified technicians and a great training system for apprentices. They also send text with technicians pictures before they arrive.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with our service! We look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Amy Harrelson
text: Michael Schultz did an excellent job fixing our plumbing issues. We have used other plumbing services in the past but they ended up making larger messes that then needed to be fixed! Affordable Plumbing & Heating is reliable, prompt, super courteous, and efficient. They are experts in the field and we will never use anyone else!

name: Patrice Kinsey
text: Mr. Emanuel is Very professional as well as knowledgeable about his work. We will call again if the need arises. Hopefully we get him also.

name: Christy Oliver
text: Kendell, who came by to do a quick inspection was knowledgeable, professional, and personable. I’ve always had a great experience with this company and their employees. I’m a happy repeat customer.

name: Phil Gagnet
text: Matt took care of issue. Honest, friendly an on time. His empowerment will keep us as customers.

name: Earl Gochey
text: Affordable, once again, responded quickly - next morning - and repaired an old - 11 years - tankless water heater that others have been baffled by. Mike worked on my equipment and had HW running within an hour of arrival. Thx Mike, another nice job.

resp.text: Thank you for your continued business. While we hope you never need us we are always standing by to serve you.

name: Victoria Young
text: Tony was amazing. He listened to all of my concerns and went above and beyond what he came out to do to get the job done right! Thank you for your help.

name: Mary Anne Doccolo
text: Newton was FANTASTIC!!!! He was professional and personable, great qualities in a young man, especially these days. Thank you very much.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Margie Cooley
text: My technician Raio .was very professional very thorough on-time courteous  I. would. recommend  affordable.  Ralo. is. the. best.  technician  that. i. have. seen. .Answers. all. questions.  you. have.., Dont.  rush.  in. and. out makes. sure. you. understand.  what. needs. to. be.  done..Ralo. know.  his work. very. knowledgeable.

name: Mary Arnout
text: Michael is very knowledgeable, professional, courteous and hard working!!  He did an excellent job for me and, I would recommend Affordable Plumbing, Heating and Air  to my family and friends. Thank you Michael!!

name: Lisa Scott
text: Michael was very knowledgeable, friendly, and entertaining. He fixed our issue and explained exactly what he was going to do before he did it. Thank you so much for your help Michael!

name: Matt McKelvain
text: Ralo was very professional and personable and did a great job of explaining what the problem was! Fixed the problem in pretty quick fashion and did an excellent job on the clean up! I highly recommend Ralo for anybody out there looking for a quality guy who knows his plumbing!

name: Jeffrey Ison
text: Michael arrived on time and worked diligently to fix a clogged main drain that was causing a backup of two bathrooms in the house. He gave good effort and the lower cost methods before moving on to progressively more invasive methods of clearing the clog, eventually leading to the removal of a toilet and the use of a big electric drain snake. The clog was successfully removed, the toilet was reinstalled with a new wax ring, and he cleaned up the mess before he left. Great service with a smile.

name: Cathy Milby
text: Did thorough job of discerning problem in a timely manner.  He was courteous and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you were with Matt!

name: Emily Robertson
text: Michael and Rhane did a great job replacing my lift pump. Very professional, clean, and friendly! Great workers!

name: Joy Tanner
text: Michael was AMAZING!!!!!!! So personable, helpful and patient. Highly recommend this company and Michael. And his apprentice was just as wonderful! All 4 of my dogs loved them, and they don’t like a lot of people. Lol! Great company with excellent employees. 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼

name: Erica Ford
text: My experience with Affordable plumbing was above and beyond what I expected. Shelley (in the office) was extremely helpful and sweet. Alex is the best. He was prompt, professional and extremely nice. I highly recommend Alex to anyone looking for quality work from a guy with the best attitude.

resp.text: We strive for 100% customer satisfaction and are pleased you are satisfied with your service!

name: Charmaine Oates
text: It has been a long time since I have had such a good experience with an expert technician.  Michael has visited our house two times for repairs and both times he went “above and beyond”.  He explained the problem in detail, discussed the overall picture, and explained pricing before doing the work.  Everyone I have spoken to on the phone with this company has been courteous and professional.

name: Amy H
text: Our experience with Affordable Plumbing was way more than we expected! Our plumber, Matt Cook, did an outstanding job! He fixed issues that have been plaguing us for a long time and even fixed issues from our last plumber (different company) when they couldn't figure out the fix and just rigged it! Matt has extensive knowledge and is honest and efficient. He really knows what he's doing! I HIGHLY recommend Matt Cook at Affordable Plumbing!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: michele dumas
text: The employee that came out was friendly and helpful. He even offered advice on how to prevent further problems . I would definitely use the service again .

name: JR. Bug
text: These guys have unmatched service! Professional, courteous, and informative. If I ever have anyone ask who to call, they would be the only choice to refer.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with our service.

name: Seth Newsom
text: Kendell camel inspected our HVAC system. He was detailed knowledgeable experienced and professional.  Pricing was great you want the best you go with the best

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with Kendell. He is a very important member of our team!

name: Elaine Day
text: Mike was friendly and knowledgeable. He was patient with my questions, answered them thoroughly and performed all the work as requested. I was so pleased with his professionalism, honesty and performance, I signed up for the VIP program. Thank you Mike.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how Michael continues to exceed expectations!

name: SL
text: Michael from Affordable Plumbing provided fantastic customer service and was extremely professional.  I originally called to have a plumber fix a water line break.  Soon after I decided to attempt the repair myself.  I cancelled the repair request, but Michael was in the area and stopped by to see if I needed anything.   He was able to answer a couple technical questions which helped me with my repair and gave me information about their VIP program, which seems like a very good deal.  I would definitely recommend Affordable Plumbing and Michael.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Dawn’s Music
text: Newton did an outstanding job. Very knowledgeable, personable and honest. He goes above and beyond. This was our second time using AP and Newton.  A very satisfied customer.

resp.text: We are glad that you were pleased with Newton. He is a valued assist to the team!

name: Paul Parham
text: Matt was my plumber and he has been taken care of a vacation home for all of our plumbing needs. He's very professional, very courteous and a very knowledgeable Plumber. Whenever I have plumbing needs on the Eastern Shore I'm calling Affordable Plumbing and ask for Matt!

resp.text: Thank your for your wonderful review. We also service Mobile County as well.

name: Seth Newsom
text: Kendell camel inspected our HVAC system. He was detailed knowledgeable experienced and professional.  Pricing was great you want the best you go with the best

text: Mike was friendly and knowledgeable. He was patient with my questions, answered them thoroughly and performed all the work as requested. I was so pleased with his professionalism, honesty and performance, I signed up for the VIP program. Thank you Mike.

name: Angel Shipley
text: Mr.Taylor was very pleased with the job Matt Cook did for him, very professional and polite. Great experience all around, Thank you

name: Diana Wingard
text:
Alex and his Apprentice arrived on time and were very professional and polite. They did an awesome job fixing my water heater and they did it quickly. Alex clearly explained to me the cost and what they would need to do before they did it. This is invaluable to a homeowner. Even more surprising, I went upstairs to clean up after them and there was absolutely not a speck of trash or putty or anything for me to clean up. I really appreciate that.
I would recommend Alex and his Apprentice ( I forgot his name, sorry about that) to anyone!!!

Thank you for doing such an awesome job Alex and thank you Affordable Plumbing for having such high standards and obviously great employees!

name: Jim
text:
My tech was Joseph.  Not listed in your list of plumbers.  Still need cy of VIP plan.

Good home review.  Tell Joseph his truck is leaking transmission fluid.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know that Joseph's photo was not on the link. We will get that addressed ASAP. We have put a copy of the VIP literature in the mail today. We will also get his truck in the shop ASAP! We appreciate all of your valuable feedback.

name: Thad Stewart
text: The level of professionalism from the initial phone call requesting assistance to the service provided was exceptional.

name: Bailey Brown
text: Great quality of service! Michael was very professional and knowledgeable!! Will be using them in the future!

name: Karen Peacock
text: We had just arrived back home from Orlando.  We started having major issues with our shower / toilet / plumbing.  No matter what we did, it only got worse.  We called and Matt came out ...  (this was 5:30 pm on a Saturday evening).  Because of our 38 y. o. home he had to really work,  and had to come back next morning (Sunday)   We were very pleased with Matt's work ethic,  and friendliness.   It made a tough situation bearable.  He was very knowledgeable and it showed.  We  cannot praise Matt enough.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with Matt. He is a very valued employee.

name: Amanda Flowers
text:
The entire staff at affordable plumbing,Heating and air are awesome! I have called them for many issues after hours and they never turn me down. They are very reasonable in price.
Randy is awesome,mike,summer,Cindy. The owner came all the way to my house to meet me and bring his guys lunch. We love our new AC unit and appreciate their hard work. Highly recommend!

name: Cardinal Flower
text: Very please with professionalism.  I would definitely recommend this company to others and plan to continue to use them for my household repairs.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We strive for 100% satisfaction and 5 star service and love to hear that we have achieved our goal.

name: Mike Scanland
text: Matt came in and immediately assessed problem gave us a quote and got busy. Great job, no mess. I will not hesitate should I need a plumber to call again or recommend Affordable Plumber to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with Matt!

name: C Darby Ulery
text: Ralo was very kind and professional! He fixed the problem quickly!

name: Diana Wingard
text:
Alex and his Apprentice arrived on time and were very professional and polite. They did an awesome job fixing my water heater and they did it quickly. Alex clearly explained to me the cost and what they would need to do before they did it. This is invaluable to a homeowner. Even more surprising, I went upstairs to clean up after them and there was absolutely not a speck of trash or putty or anything for me to clean up. I really appreciate that.
I would recommend Alex and his Apprentice ( I forgot his name, sorry about that) to anyone!!!

Thank you for doing such an awesome job Alex and thank you Affordable Plumbing for having such high standards and obviously great employees!

name: Robin Richardson
text: Got the job done quickly and reasonably priced. Will use them again.

name: David Walker
text: Friendly tech. Absolutly no issues with him. Only issue had was when we scheduled the appointment we had asked for a rough estimate of price and we weren't given a correct answer. We were told around 90 and bill was 233. So might be nice if they were a bit more specific instead of waiting till the tech was at the house to mention the original fee was just to have them show up.

resp.text: I apologize that your client service representative did not explain the service fee very well to you. We will be holding a training session with her today.

name: steve allen
text: Micheal was very professional and he did an awesome job

name: Karen Abercrombie
text: Excellent/knowledgeable/friendly! Thank you!! Very pleased to work with your company!

name: Elizabeth Ray
text: Matt gave his usual great service! Thank you.

name: Joe P
text: Called Affordable Plumbing for an estimate to fix a water leak. Michael S. was very friendly and thoroughly explained the repair options. He went above and beyond in the time he spent answering all my questions. Will update if have repairs performed by Affordable Plumbing.

resp.text: Michael is very thorough in his job. He is a valued employee. Thank you for letting us know you are pleased with his service.

name: Shelony Aaron
text: I felt that Kendall was very efficient in his work and answering my questions. He took the time to explain things to me (even used pictures for me to better understand) and not one did he mind my kids or dog.

resp.text: Kendell is a very valued employee. Thank you for letting us know that he continues to exceed in the service he provides.

name: Gaye Appelman
text: The technician, Kendell Graves, who inspected our HVAC system did a wonderful job. He was thorough as he carefully inspected the system but also took the extra time to explain the functions of the parts and made sure I understood. He was very courteous and respectful. When he finished, he made recommendations for the best efficiency of the system. Good job, Kendell!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know that Kendell is meeting and exceeding your expectations.

name: stephanie dinkins
text: Michael is very respectful, knows his job very well and does very clean work.   We are very satisfied with his work .

resp.text: Thank you so much for letting us know how pleased you were with Micheal! He goes above and beyond the call of duty for his clients.

name: tracey coleman
text: The serviceman Michael was very professional and he took the time to explain everything to me concerning my water heater and water heaters in general. Thanks affordable plumbing

resp.text: You are so welcome and thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with Michael, he is a valued team player!

name: Margaret Ard
text: Josh with Affordable Plumbing did an awesome job. Very knowledgeable when answering questions - showed up on time and left with everything back in place. Would recommend Affordable Plumbing to friends

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know that Josh continues to meet & exceed your expectations!

name: Stephanie Cazalas
text: Matt was thorough, professional and stands behind his work. Will definitely call Affordable Plumbing again.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to be of service to you!

name: Byron A. Lassiter
text: Alex did a GREAT JOB!  We had a complicated plumbing situation and had to have a new sewer pump and tank.  We also wanted to get a  tankless  gas hot water heater.  Alex worked hard for two days, and everything works PERFECTLY!  Everything was neat, tidy and done very well.  We could not be happier!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know that you are satisfied with Alex and the work he performed!

name: Tracie
text: Joseph was professional and very respectful outstanding service. Will highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you are with Joseph!

name: Alan Weakley
text: Matt was courteous and knowledgeable. Even paid attention to details by turning off the attic lights and closing the doors. Sometimes that's actually hard to find with people doing work for you in your home.

resp.text: Thank you  for your thoughtful words. Matt is a lovely employee.

name: patricia Delaney
text: I had the privilege of meeting Kendall Graves from affordable Plumbing for my Yearly check on my Ac . Not only was he so educated on the works and tips for my unit . He was not a pressure salesman trying to talk me into things I don’t need and he was able not to just  tell me but show me pictures of what he found that needed attention. I highly recommend if you should need any plumbing or Ac work please call and speak to Shelly who is just wonderfull and ask for Kendall

resp.text: Your family's health is very important to us. As the experts it is our job to make you aware of any issues we find and educate you on the options for making your quality of life better. Kendell is definitely one of a kind and very valued. Thank you for letting us know that he is doing his job well. We hope you have a wonderful day.

name: Sandy Faust
text: Affordable Plumbing did a great job repairing a busted water line in my house. They were fast and efficient. The service person was very professional and knowledgeable. He explained everything clearly. The first contact in the office was very welcoming. She did an excellent job letting me know about other services they offer. And like the name, they were very affordable and I appreciated the upfront and clear discussion regarding billing. There were no surprises which is exactly how you want a service call to go. Good job!

name: Susan Maddison
text: Matt and his helper were SO knowledgeable! They were kind and polite were able to fix my plumbing problems easily! AT a very affordable price.  Affordable plumbing is AWESOME!!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you were with Matt & his helper!

name: Kimberly Huffty
text: Friendly customer service. Operator called confirmed appointment and gave me a 10-15 minute window. The technician gave me a quote before starting work. Went above and beyond to make sure all three needs I called for were to my satisfaction. Overall very pleased!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you letting us know how pleased you were with Matt and the office staff. Thank you.

name: Rob Donna
text:
All work was quality and competed above expectations. All work and prices were explained ahead of time.
We will welcome them back for our next project or problem.

name: Joel Sappington

name: Jeff Chartier
text:
Very impressive customer service! I was having an issue with very low water pressure/water flow throughout my entire house. Affordable Plumbing located an area of the pipe that had been crushed by a root of a tree just as it entered the foundation and went under the slab. They were able to remove and replace the damaged section. It was only through the persistence and perseverance of the two technicians that they were able to locate the problem.
In addition to repairing the damaged pipe to correct water flow they also installed a booster pump to increase my water pressure. Jason and Alex worked tirelessly all day until 8:30 at night to insure the job was completed properly and there were no unresolved issues. I now have fantastic water pressure and water flow and for exactly the cost that was quoted to me originally.
The men showed up on time, were very courteous and concerned with my satisfaction. They did an excellent job cleaning up at the end of the day as well.
I would highly recommend Affordable Plumbing to anyone with any plumbing needs at all.
Thank you Affordable Plumbing and Jason and Alex for a job well done!

text:
I had Affordable Plumbing Sewer and Drain come out for a leaky pipe a year ago, and they did such a fantastic job! I was so happy that they were so quick, professional and on point. They even sent me a coupon for a free AC Tune Up. I called and scheduled the tune up and the guy firstly told me they are just doing an inspection, that even though I called for a Tune up (which on their site says it includes "Your thermostat and other AC controls will be checked
Inspect and repair of your unit’s electrical components
Adjustment of refrigerant levels
Cleaning of indoor and outdoor coils
Inspect and lubricate any moving part"
He said that they weren't going to do any of that, just look and then charge me for any actual labor that needed to be done.
He then handed me a pamplet with service plans that were monthly ACH.

I don't think that there was a miscommunication because I specifically told the service scheduler that I wanted to have my refrigerant levels adjusted.

It's disappointing and i'll still consider them for plumbing needs, but the way he was questioning my intelligence was unforgivable.

name: Janet Fincher
text: I called to speak with the owner about our negative experience but he never returned my call. They quoted my mom $346.14 to change a shower cartridge and remove a drain basket strainer. He said the part was $86.00 but at Lowes it is $29.99. He also charged a $89.00 service call fee and wanted a additional $171.00 for the labor that took all of 15 minutes to complete by another company this morning. They took advantage of my mom because she is a older woman and this upsets me. I called 5 companies today and they all charge $40 to $55 for a service call. He said they charge more because they are licensed and bonded. Well almost everyone is these days. Please be careful using this company because they are not Affordable like their name states and they are very dishonest and will not return your call. $89.00 spent for nothing but a quote on paper for $346.14.

resp.text: Mrs. Fincher, our service manager, Tony, tried to reach you at the number you left in the office the day you called. No voicemail picked up for him to leave you a message. We do not use parts from big box stores as they are not of the best quality. Yes you may find the same name and type of parts but they are not made to the same standards. It is like buying a Dell computer from anywhere but Dell. It has the Dell logo but has not been built to the same Dell standards had you purchased it directly from Dell. We are upfront about our service fee and each client is advised about the service fee prior to booking the service call. We do give upfront pricing before any work is done so there is no surprises and operate on a straightforward price guide. Not all companies carry the proper licenses and insurances. We also randomly drug test our employees and conduct national background checks to ensure the safety of each homeowner and their families. We are based on 20% profit so of the $346.14 that you were quoted the company would have made $69.23. To maintain our 24 hour service 365 days a year and our guarantees we don't believe that $69 is unreasonable.

Blake did a thorough inspection of the system. He was professional, helpful and answered all questions politely.  He is a great asset!

Ralo replaced our PRV on our meter.  Fast, personable and great asset!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know how pleased you have been with our Heating & Air team!

text: Had some serious plumbing issues on a 60 year old house.  Appointment was set up quickly and professionally, the plumber , Bill, arrived on time, diagnosed the problems and completed the work quickly at a fair price.  Would highly recommend.

name: Jeff L.
text:
I Have used Affordable many times. And in a world where we have come to expect mediocre work and poor customer service,  Every  time I have used Affordable plumbing I have been pleasantly surprised by their prompt service, ("They actually show up when when they say they will") their professional, knowledgeable technicians, and their workmanship. I own several rental properties and the services I have used ranged from simple drain backups, all the way to an emergency complete house re-pipe. I know when I all them my problem is solved first time every time. YOU CAN'T DO BETTER! Nuf said.
Jeff L.

name: Tj Merchant
text: I called  yesterday to have someone come out to unclog my sink, they said it wouldn't be a problem and that they would call me in the morning between 8-9 to let me know when they could come out. At almost 11 I still had not heard from them so I called only to be told they were booked until Tuesday of next week. So now I have missed a day of work, still have a clogged sink, all because they do not know how to schedule appointments or to even call a customer when they say. I will never call again and I will be sure to tell my family friends about the horrible service!

name: Mike Wehner
text: Overcharged my wife for very little work. Did not fix problem. I called to get them to evaluate and fix a leaking waterkey. They Left the waterkey leaking everywhere and did a quick fix on the supply line connection that did not fix the problem. They still charged us a crazy amount for a job half done that we had to finish ourselves. Pity I was at work when they toke advantage of my wife that was unsure of the problem i trusted them to fix.

resp.text: Mr. Wehner, when you technician was out there he performed a pressure test and visually inspected the repairs before leaving and nothing was leaking at that time.  We get the job right 98% of the time the first time and 100% the second time. Unfortunately we did not get the chance to return and correct the leak.

name: Second Handed

name: Doug Daily
text: Had a backed up sink.   Called Affordable Plumbing Sewer & Drain.  Matt arrived early the next day and did everything he could do to inform and teach as he went through the problem.  Made excellent recommendations on what the problem was and how to fully resolve any future problems.  Matt was a true professional, knew his job, not only as a Plumber, but as a teacher on what needed to be done.  Any future problems in the plumbing area will result in an immediate call to these professionals.  Thank you Matt!

name: Jason Lyons
text: I don't know exactly what is affordable about 900 to replace a p trap under a bathroom sink. Then they tried to convince my grandmother to replace her water heater. Luckily she's not a typical little old lady. These people should be ashamed of themselves.

resp.text: Mr. Lyons, we would really like to be able to address this issue with you. Without having your grandmothers information we have no way to research to see what exactly was done at her home. $900 to simply replace a P-trap does not sound right. Please contact us at 251-990-5248.

text: On September 3rd 2015, Mr. Bill Sansom, Affordable Plumbing, found faulty copper water line underground in crawl space, causing leaks and water damage due to corrosion. Bill answered any and all questions that I would have at any given moment and it is a relief to know that a great plumbing company is right here in Fairhope and truly affordable.

They really go out of their way to show that they care about my home and my business.  Top notch company if you ask me.  Now this is how you run a business right!!!! Way to go!!!!
